loans.name: Solidario Kairos 3 Group

texts.es: Solidario Kayros 3. Este grupo esta integrado por tres señoras las cuales se dedican a ala misma actividad una de ellas es la lider de este grupo,quien es Maria etelvina, de 37 años tiene 5 hijos tres estudian y los otros dos todavia esta pequeños,ella se dedica a la elavoracion de tejidos tipicos,desde hace 3 años,es una persona que se caracterisa por ser muy luchadora por alcanzar sus metas.ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos tipicos,ya que biene la epoca que se vende muy bien y nececita invertir mas para asi lograr aumentas su ganacias,al igual que las otras socias estan solicitando este credito para la compra de mas mercaderia para seguir con su negocio.
texts.en: The “Kayros 3” solidarity group is composed of three women who are all in the same occupation.  The group leader is María Etelvina, 37.  She has five children, three of them are in school and two are still too young.  She has been manufacturing traditional fabric for three years.  She is a person who is characterized by being very tenacious in her quest toward her goals.  She is asking for this loan to buy raw materials to make traditional fabric since a season of high sales is approaching and she needs to invest more in order to increase profits.  The other group members are also asking for the loan to buy more merchandise to continue with their business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to weave fabric.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Maria Del Carmen es una mujer que siempre ha luchado por generar ingresos para el hogar, como madre de 6 hijos siempre se ha preocupado por brindarles un mejor futuro, actualmente tiene su negocio que es la venta de mercadería en general donde vende calzado, trajes para niños, sabanas, cosméticos, tratamientos y reloj, pues para ella lo más importante es satisfacer las necesidades de compra de sus clientes, por lo que procura siempre tener surtida su inventario. Ella tiene la necesidad de surtir el negocio, pues se acerca una temporada alta donde las ventas aumentan y proporcionalmente las ganancias también, pero no cuenta con el capital para hacer las compras de un buen surtido, por lo que solicita un crédito que le permita mejorar las utilidades del negocio.
texts.en: María Del Carmen is a woman who has always striven to generate income for her home.  As the mother of six children she’s always been concerned about providing them with a better future.  She currently has a business selling general merchandise.  She sells footwear, children’s outfits, sheets, cosmetics, treatments and watches because it’s important for her to be able to meet customer needs so she always tries to have a varied inventory on hand.  She needs to stock her business because a high sales season is approaching so profits increase proportionately but she does not have capital to buy a good assortment of goods so is asking for a loan that will make it possible for her to improve the business’ profits.

loans.use: to buy assorted merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic grains, bread, sweets, soft drinks, noodles, eggs and soups.

loans.name: Henry Octavio

texts.es: A sus 39 años Henry Octavio es un emprendedor que sueña con agrandar su negocio, el se dedica a brindar el servicio de carpintería. Es consciente que para cumplir su sueño necesitará un préstamo con el cual comprar pega, madera, clavos, maque y herramientas de trabajo para realizar los diferentes pedidos que le realizan pues actualmente no cuenta con el capital necesario. Henry es un luchador incansable que se propuso mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia por lo que trabaja cada día con la motivación de cumplir sus metas.
texts.en: At the age of 39, Henry Octavio is an entrepreneur who dreams with enlarging his business.  He is a carpenter.  He is aware that in order to reach his dream he will need a loan to buy glue, lumber, nails, varnish and work tools to fill the various orders he has pending because he currently lacks the necessary capital.  Henry is a tireless fighter who has resolved to improve his and his family’s quality of life and is motivated to work daily to reach his goals.

loans.use: to buy glue, lumber, nails, varnish and tools.

loans.name: Reyna Margarita

texts.es: Reyna Margarita tiene la actividad de pulpería ya hace bastante tiempo, está ubicado en su vivienda, a ella le va muy bien porque tiene muchos clientes por el buen servicio que brinda, inicio porque su Mama se encargaba de realizar las compras fue por su esposo que juntos decidieron hacerse cargo de este negocio. El crédito será invertido en la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, pan, galletas, refrescos, sopas, papel higiénico y huevos. Es una persona dinámica con ganas de superación su deseo es el de mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y de su familia.
texts.en:
Reyna Margarita has had a grocery store for some time now; it’s located in her house and she does very well because she has many customers thanks to the good service she provides.  It started because her mother used to do the purchases and then she and her husband decided to take charge of the business.

The loan will be used to buy basic grains, snacks, bread, cookies, soft-drinks, soup, toilet paper and eggs.  She is a dynamic person with a strong drive to get ahead; her wish is to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Evergreen Group

texts.en:
Milton is 37 years old and lives in Harare. He is married and has two children, one of whom is attending school.  Milton runs a manufacturing business producing chemicals. The business has been in operation for 2 years.

He says the major challenges he faces are lack of capital and stiff competition. Milton has requested a loan of $400.00 to purchase raw materials. He says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow him to improve the well being of his family. In the future, Milton plans to export chemicals.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for producing chemicals.

loans.name: Anointed Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Harare. This is Cuthbert, aged 41. He is married and has three children, all of whom are attending school. He also cares for one dependent.

Cuthbert runs a retail business selling grocieries. The business has been in operation for 3 years. He says the main challenges he faces include competition in terms of pricing and duty charges on basic commodities. Cuthbert has requested a loan of $400.00 to buy groceries. He says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will enhance his life in terms of providing basic needs. In the future, Cuthbert plans to open a wholesale shop or a supermarket.

loans.use: to buy groceries for sale in his shop

loans.name: Alexander Francisco

texts.es:
Alexander cada dia, trabaja en su taxi, recoriendo la capital, su esposa esta haciendo repochetas y tajadas por la noche en ventas en su casa, y asi poder solventar gastos en su hogar.
Alexander  logro dar un buen mantenimiento a su vehiculo con el credito anterior, lo que trabajo en mejores condiciones de trabajo, luego tuvo dificultad, al tener un pequeño choque, dejando la parte delantera del carro un poco mal, que aun no ha reparado. Y que con este nuevo financiamiento podra enderechar y pintar el carro.
No paso a mayores dificultades, ha trabajado, solo que es su medio de trabajo y tiene que darle siempre mantenimiento. Cuidando su vida y la de los pasajeros. Lo que espera en este nuevo año es que baje el combustible, y asi tener mejor ganancia.
texts.en:
Alexander works in his taxi every day driving through the city. His wife sells Nicaraguan quesadillas and fried plantains at night from their home. Through their work, they can cover the house expenses. Alexander has used his previous credit well in the general maintenance of his car. Unfortunately, he ran into some problems by having a small car accident. The front part of his taxi was damaged, which hasn't been repaired yet. With this new loan, he will carry out some body work and paint his taxi.

He has not had more problems and has managed to keep working with his taxi. Since this is his way of life, he has to provide good maintenance to his taxi. Taking care of his life and the passengers as well. Alexander hopes that the gasoline prices will fall this year to improve his earnings.

loans.use: to paint and do body work for his taxi and continue to provide taxi services to his clients.

loans.name: Norlan Jose

texts.es: Norlan se dedica a se dedica a brindar los servicios carpintería, hace mas de 7 años que tiene de poseer este medio de vida.  Él aprendió este oficio por un amigo que juntos decidieron establecer un taller, fue así que juntos decidieron sacar adelante a sus familia, con mucho esfuerzo Norlan compro un triciclo que lo alquila y también le genera ganancias a su hogar. El préstamo lo necesita para comprar madera, clavos, maque, pega, martillo entre otros, de esa forma podrá crecer su negocio y tendrá más clientela para ofrecer la diversidad de productos.
texts.en: Norlan has been providing carpentry services; he’s had this means of support for over seven years.  He learned the business with a friend and they decided to open a shop together.  This is how they decided together to support their families.  With much effort Norlan bought a three-wheeled cart that he leases out and it also generates family income.  He needs the loan to buy lumber, nails, varnish, glue and a hammer, among others in order to make his business grow and have more customers because he can offer a variety of products.

loans.use: to buy lumber, nails, varnish, glue and a hammer, among others.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy materials to manufacture seat covers, ladies skirts, toilet seats, and bedspreads for sale.

loans.name: Jose Ramon

texts.es: José Ramón de 37 años, tiene 2 hijos bajo su cargo. El negocio consiste en prestar el servicio de triciclo, además tiene su pulpería. Hace más 10 años inició este negocio con la venta de granos básicos como arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, consomé, especies, cereales, pan, refrescos, productos lácteos, jugos. El es muy trabajador, empieza su actividad desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche. Solicito este préstamo para compra de materia prima. Su gran sueño es llegar a tener un supermercado ya establecido en un lugar estratégico.
texts.en:
José Ramón, 37, has 2 dependent children.  His business is a general store and tricycle lending.  He started the business more than 10 years ago selling basic grains such as rice, and sugar, beans, oil, consume, spices, cereals, bread, soft drinks, dairy products and juices.  He is very hard-working.  He opens his business at 7 am and closes at 9 pm.
He requested the loan to buy basic supplies.  His dream is to eventually have an established supermarket in an advantageous location.

loans.use: to buy basic grains such as rice, and sugar, beans, oil, consume, spices, cereals, bread, soft drinks, dairy products and juices

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
el sr. Carlos Alberto tiene 47 años de edad, esta casado y de su matrimonio solo dependen 3 hijos, Carlos es Caficultor y Agricultor, cuenta con varios años de experiencia en el cultivo de café y agricultura, gracias a este tipo de actividad a logrado mantener a su familia y darle el estudios a sus hijos. Don Carlos utilizara el credito para comprar una planta solar y así mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia,  él necesita tener energía en su casa para laborar hasta ciertas horas de la noche.
asi mismo proveer entretenimiento a sus hijos ya sea por medio de tv o radio.
texts.en: Carlos Alberto is 47 years old, married and with 3 dependent children from their marriage. Carlos is a coffee grower and agriculturist. He has many years of experience in the production of coffee and agriculture. Thanks to his work, he has supported his family and provided an education for his children. Don Carlos will use the loan to buy a solar plant and improve their quality of life. He needs to have electricity in his house to work during the night and to provide his children with entertainment from a TV or radio.

loans.use: to buy a solar plant.

loans.name: Leybin Guadalupe

texts.es: Leybin Guadalupe tiene 25 años, su actividad es un kiosco hace tiempo que tiene este medio de vida. Ella ha demostrado el pagar sus cuotas en tiempo y forma, por lo que siempre está pendiente de lo que sus clientes le solicitan. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, pan, sopas entre otros. Ella tiene una gran variedad de clientes que siempre le solicitan diferentes pedidos. Sueña con mejorar cada día y al mismo tiempo poder realizarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en: Leybin Guadalupe is 25 years old. She has worked for many years in her own kiosk. She has demonstrated that she will make her payments properly and on time. She is always attentive to her clients' request. The loan will be used to buy snack foods, beverages, bread, packaged soups, and other things. She has a great variety of clients who always ask for different orders. She dreams of making each day better and, at the same time, improving her house.

loans.use: to buy snack foods, beverages, bread, packaged soups, and other things.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
el sr. Alejandro tiene 57 años de edad, vive en unión libre y en estos momentos solo un hijo depende de el, sus demas hijos ya se casaron y han formado nuevos hogares, Alejandro se dedica a la Caficultura y Agricultura.
Don Alejandro utilizara el credito para comprar un sistema solar y así dejar de alumbrarse con candiles y ocote, mismos que son dañinos para la salud y el ambiente,  con candiles se a alumbrado su casa por toda su vida, él piensa que con la compra del sistema solar cambiara su manera de vida y la de su familia que es lo que han anhelado por muchos tiempos.
texts.en:
Sr. Alejandro is 57 years old, in a common-law marriage, and only has one child who is still a dependent. His other children are married and have their own households. Alejandro is a farmer who grows coffee and other crops.

Don Alejandro will use this loan to buy a solar panel system so that he can have light in his home without having to use candles or firewood since they can be harmful to one’s health and the environment. He has been using candles to light his home his entire life. Alejandro believes purchasing a solar panel system will change the lifestyle of himself and his family. They have longed for this for quite some time.

loans.use: to purchase a solar panel system.

loans.name: David Antonio

texts.es: David Antonio se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, hace más de 3 años que tiene este medio de vida. Inicio este negocio por la necesidad de sufragar los gastos de su hogar. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de tomates, cebollas, papa, bananos, plátano, zanahoria entre otros. En el negocio le ayuda su esposa. Su deseo es agrandar el espacio de su tramo de su negocio y tener más inventario para el negocio.
texts.en:
David Antonio sells fruits and vegetables. He has earned his living in this manner for more than three years. David started this business out of necessity so that he could cover his household expenses.

This loan will be used to buy tomatoes, onions, potatoes, bananas, plantains, carrots, and other items. His wife helps with the business. David’s wish is to expand the space of his vending post so that he can have more inventory for his business.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, potatoes, bananas, plantains, carrots, and other items.

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es:
el sr. Roberto Carlos Tiene 40 años de edad, esta casado y es padre de 7 hijos, mismos que le ayudan en los trabajos de campo, Roberto se dedica a la caficultura desde hace más de 10 años, actualmente tiene 4 manzana de café cosechera y también se ha dedicado a la agricultura (maíz y frijoles). 
Don Roberto utilizara el credito para comprar un sistema solar, ya que él cree que al obtenerlo va a mejorar su estilo de vida y también quiere dejar de usar candil y candelas las cuales afectan su salud y la de su familia.
gracias a este tipo de producto el podra mejorar su calidad de vida y asi mismo podra escuchar noticias y cargar un celular para estar en contacto con su familia.
texts.en:
Sr. Roberto Carlos is 40 years old, married, and the father of seven children who help with the farm work. He has been growing coffee for more than 10 years. Roberto currently has four plots of land on which he grows coffee, but he also grows other crops such as corn and beans.

Don Roberto will use this loan to buy a solar panel system. He expects that obtaining this system will improve his lifestyle because he will no longer have to use oil lamps and candles, which could impact his health and that of his family.

He is grateful for this type of product that can improve his quality of life. This system will enable him to listen to the news, recharge his mobile phone, and stay in contact with his family.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel system.

loans.name: Idilfonso Aquilino

texts.es: A sus 55 años Ildifonso es un hombre y padre responsable que decidió montar su propio negocio como una ayuda económica para sacar a sus hijos adelante. El tiene una pulpería sueña con tener más espacio y mercancía donde acomodar el negocio. El quiere comprar un surtido mayor para su negocio, logrando generar más utilidades, ampliando la variedad en el producto y aumentando las ventas, de manera que más clientes lleguen a su negocio. Solicita un crédito para invertir en gaseosas, dulces, granos básicos, pan y sopas.
texts.en:
Ildifonso is a 55-year-old gentleman and a responsible father. He decided to establish his own business so that he could help his children move forward financially. Ildifonso has a store and dreams of having more space and merchandise to accommodate his business.

He wants to restock his business with more inventory so that he can generate better profits, expand the variety of products that he offers, and increase his sales. Ildifonso hopes that more customers will come to his store. He is requesting a loan to invest in sodas, candy, basic grains, bread, and soups.

loans.use: to buy sodas, candy, basic grains, bread, and soups.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce lives in the Changamwe area of Coast Province, Kenya. She has nine children, and, currently, only one attends school; most of the older ones are independent. Joyce operates a water kiosk. She began this venture in order to meet her children’s basic and educational needs.  Besides this, Joyce also operates a food stall and a charcoal shop.
Joyce joined Milango in order to access credit to finance her business operations. She has been supplying water to the residents around Changamwe and has applied for a loan of Ksh 40,000 to help her pay water bills and buy plastic jerican drums.
She dreams of running a chain of food stalls, as this will enable her educate the last child who depends on her.

loans.use: to pay water bills and purchase jerican plastic drums.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio Cesar de 38 años es subdirector. Sueña con tener más espacio en su vivienda. El quiere realizar este crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, bloques, entre otros. El quiere construir un cuarto para ampliar la comodidad de su hogar, Julio tiene 1 hijo bajo su cargo y quiere realizar estas mejoras en su vivienda para que el día de mañana su hijo no tenga problemas de espacio. con este financiamiento mercancía será beneficiado y su calidad de vida mejorará notablemente.
texts.en: Julio Cesar, age 38, is an assistant manager.  He dreams of having more space in his home, so he plans to use this loan to buy cement, sand, blocks, and other materials.  Julio wants to build a room in order to provide more comfort within his home.  He has a dependent child under his care, so he wants to make these improvements to his home in anticipation of the day when they will no longer have problems concerning space.  As a result of this loan, he will experience the benefits and his quality of life will improve considerably.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, blocks, and other materials.

loans.name: Alba Marina

texts.es: Alba Marina se dedica a la venta de ropa, tiene más de 4 años en este negocio. Ella es una persona muy dedicada la vida es un regalo, ya que está feliz por haber encontrado muchos caminos por elegir y el desenvolverse en lo que más le gusta. En un futuro desea ampliar su negocio, pero necesita mucho capital para realizar este sueño. Este será su primer crédito para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes y vestidos.
texts.en:
Alba Marina has been selling clothes for more than four years. She is a devoted person who believes life is a gift. Alba is very happy that she has had many paths to choose from where she can develop according to what she enjoys the most. In the future she wants to expand her business, but she needs more capital in order to fulfill this dream.

This will be her first loan and she will use the money to buy trousers, shirts, skirts, suits, and dresses.

loans.use: to buy trousers, shirts, skirts, suits, and dresses.

loans.name: Ruth Mercedes

texts.es: Ruth Mercedes se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva, desde hace más de 11 años que tiene este medio de vida. Empezó este negocio con muy pocos productos pero con el paso del tiempo es que ha incrementado su inventario y también sus clientes a quienes siempre les brinda el medio de vida. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes y vestidos. Sueña con  mejorar sus ingresos y seguir adelante con este medio de vida.
texts.en:
Ruth Mercedes sells new clothing. She has earned her livelihood in this manner for more than 11 years. Ruth started this business with very few products, but as time passed she was able to increase her inventory and her customer base.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy trousers, shirts, skirts, suits, and dresses. She dreams of improving her income and moving forward with this business.

loans.use: to buy trousers, shirts, skirts, suits, and dresses.

loans.name: Norma Isabel

texts.es: Norma Isabel tiene 35 años, ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos desde hace más de 11 años que tiene este medio de vida, uno de sus mayores desafíos ha sido el tiempo pues tiene que brindarle a su hijo lo necesario y dedicarle tiempo a su negocio. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de lápiz labial, cremas, shampoo, tratamientos, pintura de uñas entre otros. Ella necesita incrementar su capital y la forma de realizarlo es obteniendo este financiamiento para la compra de materia prima.
texts.en:
Norma Isabel is 35 years old. She sells cosmetics and has earned her living in this manner for more than 11 years. One of her greatest challenges is having the time to provide what her child needs and still have time to devote to her business.

This loan will be used to buy lip pencils, crèmes, shampoo, treatments, nail polish, and other products. She needs to increase her capital, so obtaining this loan will help her buy merchandise.

loans.use: to buy lip pencils, crèmes, shampoo, treatments, nail polish, and other products.

loans.name: Santos Noe

texts.es:
el sr. Santos Noé tiene 36 años de edad, esta casado y muy orgulloso de sus 4 hijos, Santos es Caficultor y Agricultor, con más de 10 años de experiencia en el cultivo de café y agricultura,  lo que ha sido la fuente de ingresos para el sustento de su familia. 
Don Santos utilizara el credito para comprar un sistema solar y mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia ya que él manifiesta que al tener energía podrá ayudar a la superación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Sr. Santos Noé is 36 years old, married, and extremely proud of his four children. He is a coffee grower and farmer. Santos has more than 10 years of experience with farming and growing coffee. These activities make up the source of income that helps to sustain his family.

Don Santos will use this loan to buy a solar panel system, which will improve the living conditions of his family. He says that having this type of energy system will help his children thrive.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel system.

loans.name: Rosa Dilma

texts.es:
La señora Rosa Dilma, tiene 41 años de edad, casada, vive en una aldea de Omoa, Cortes, junto a su esposo y dos hijos uno de 8 y  21 años de edad. Los dos hijos están estudiando actualmente.
Ella  es una persona cristiana, y bien conocida en la aldea, trabajadora y dedicada a su negocio. Hace 3 años que se dedica a generar sus propios ingresos con la venta de mercadería, como Ropa americana y tambien zapatos.las ventas las realiza de manera ambulante o a domicilio por pedidos. su esposo recibe ingresos de su trabajo como jardinero en una propiedad privada.
Es su primer préstamo con ODEF, y es  para invertirlo en compra de zapatos y ropa para mantener siempre productos y dar una buena atención a sus clientes,  ya que es de donde obtiene ingresos para dar una mejor vida a su familia. También cubrir gastos de educación de sus hijos
texts.en:
Rosa Dilma is 41 years old and married.  She lives in the village of Omoa, Cortes with her husband and their two children, ages 8 and 21.  The two children are currently in school.

She is a Christian person, and she is well-known in the village.  She is a hard-worker and devoted to her business.  For three years she has been generating her own income by selling merchandise like American clothes and shoes.  She sells in an itinerant manner or by home orders.  Her husband earns income by working as a gardener on a private property.

This is her first loan with ODEF.  She will use the loan to buy shoes and clothes in order to always have products on hand and to give her customers good service.  Her business is where she gets income to give her family a better life.  It also covers her children’s educational expenses.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Maria Isabel tiene 47 años, ella se dedica al destace de cerdo y venta de carne de res. El negocio consiste en el destace de cerdo en su vivienda las compras de los cerdos las realiza en algunas comunidades que la conocen por dedicarse a este negocio, siempre le ha gustado ser ella quien compre el cerdo para verificar que este sano. Maria cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo también su hijo de 8 años a quien Maria le enseña a ganarse la vida humildemente. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de cerdos.
texts.en:
Maria Isabel is 47 years old. She butchers pigs and also sells beef. The pigs that she butchers for her business are raised at her home and are purchased in communities that know that she engages in this type of business. Maria has always enjoyed being in this business because she wants to verify that the pigs she acquires are healthy. She has the support of her husband. They have an eight-year-old son, so Maria wants to teach him how to live a humble life.

This loan will be used to buy pigs.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Orlando Jose

texts.es: Orlando José es operario de maquinas en la zona franca. El tiene cierto tiempo de trabajar en este lugar. El tiene muchas metas pero una de ellas es terminar de acondicionar su vivienda. El motivo del crédito que está realizando es para comprar materiales de construcción como antera, piedrín, cerámica, cemento entre otros. El no había podido realizar las mejoras necesarias porque no tenía los ingresos necesarios,  pero con la ayuda de este crédito podrá obtener lo que necesita.
texts.en: Orlando José is a machine operator in the shipping port zone. He has worked there for some time now. He has many goals, and one of them is finishing work on his home. The aim of the loan he is taking out is to buy construction materials such as stone, gravel, ceramic tile and cement, among others. He has not been able to carry out the necessary improvements because he did not have the income he needed, but with the help of this loan, he will be able to obtain what he needs.

loans.use: to buy stone, gravel, ceramic tile, cement, and other supplies.

loans.name: Maria De La Concepcion

texts.es: Maria De La Concepción brinda el servicio de nintendo, desde hace mas de 3 años que tiene este medio de vida. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que disfruta de tener un medio de ingreso para su familia. Maria tiene 4 hijos a su cargo, a pesar de no ser fácil  ha salido adelante con la ayuda de su esposo fue que decidieron establecer este negocio. el financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de discos, televisores, controles y realizarle algunas reparaciones a otros nintendos.
texts.en:
Maria De La Concepción has a business that offers Nintendo games. She has earned her livelihood in this manner for more than three years. Maria is a hardworking woman who likes having a source of income for her family. She has four children under her care. Despite not having any difficulties getting ahead with the help of her husband, she still decided to establish this business.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy discs, televisions, and controls. She will also pay for a few repairs to her Nintendo consoles.

loans.use: to buy discs, televisions, and controls and to pay for repairs to her Nintendo consoles.

loans.name: El Carmen 2 Group

texts.es:
La señora Gladis Veronica es casada, tiene 48 años D. edad, cursó estudios D. secundaria, se dedica al comercio a la venta D. ropa, tiene 5 hijos los cuales están estudiando, lleva 20 años D. experiencia en realizar su profesión, inició el comercio con la ayuda D. su señora madre, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien se dedica a la informática.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para comprar mas mercadería ya que espera mejorar su negocio comprando mas, playeras, suéteres, lencería, ropa para bebés, etc. Espera el el futuro obtener mas capital. Las demás integrantes se dedica a la venta D. queso, venta D. ropa, tejeduría y atención a tienda en general.
texts.en:
Sra. Gladis Veronica is 48 years old, married, and has a high school education. She is in the business of selling clothes. Gladis has five children who are currently in school. She has 20 years of experience in this profession and started in this traD. with the help of her mother. Gladis has the support of her husband, who works with computer systems.

She organized this group in order to request a loan so that she could buy more merchandise. Gladis expects to improve her business by purchasing more inventory such as t-shirts, sweaters, lingerie, baby clothes, and other items. She hopes to obtain more capital in the future. The other members have businesses that involve selling cheese, selling clothes, knitting, and managing a general store.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, sweaters, lingerie, baby clothes, and other items.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La señora Luz tiene 32 años de edad y vive en la aldea Sarosa, en el municipio de Progreso. Ella vive en un unión libre con su pareja, don Pedro, lo cual es albañil. Ellos llevan 5 años juntos. La señora Luz tiene 4 hijos de 13, 9, 3 años de edad y un bebe de 9 meses. Todos sus hijos, con la excepción del bebe, están estudiando. Los ingresos de la pareja se mantienen a la familia de 6.  

Hace más de cinco años, Luz se puso un negocio de venta de mercadería. Ella vende de forma ambulante, ropa, zapatos, y utensilios de cocina como tazas, vasos, platos y lavamanos hechos de plástico. Empezó el negocio con el deseo de salir adelante y apoyar a su familia. Sacó tres créditos anteriores para surtir su negocio y ella nota que su vida ha mejorado de manera favorable. Una de sus dificultades ha sido la falta de capital para invertir en su inventario.  

La señora Luz tiene previsto seguir aumentando sus ventas y con este crédito de L15,000, ella va a comprar ropa, zapatos y utensilios de cocina para ampliar su inventario y surtir al negocio.
texts.en:
Luz is 32 years old, and she lives in the village of Sarosa in the Progreso municipality.  She is in a common-law marriage with her partner, Pedro.  He is a bricklayer.  They have been together for five years.  She has four children, ages 13, 9, 3, and 9 months.  All of her children, with the exception of the baby, are in school.  The couple’s income supports the family of six.

Five years ago Luz established a business selling merchandise.  She sells clothes, shoes, and kitchen utensils like cups, glasses, plates, and plastic washbasins in an itinerant manner.  She started the business with the desire to get ahead and to support her family.

She has had three previous loans to stock her business.  She notes that her life has improved in a favorable manner.   One of her difficulties has been the lack of money to invest in her inventory.

Luz intends to continue increasing her sales with this loan for 15,000 lempiras.  She will buy clothes, shoes, and kitchen utensils to increase her inventory and stock her business.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, and kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Artesanias Del Sur Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Artesanías del Sur” lo conforman 18 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran artesanía en tejidos, en madera, venta de perfumes entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Puerto Montt.
Gladys integrante del grupo del banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra en primera fila, en el primer lugar de izquierda a derecha, arrodillada, viste una chaqueta color negro y jeans, además en sus manos sostiene un documento y un celular. Ella se dedica al rubro de la artesanía específicamente realiza tejidos, entre bufandas, gorros y vestidos, entre otros. También vende artesanía en madera y cuero. Arrienda un local en Angelmó (sector de ferias artesanales, destinadas al turismo). Se dedica a éste rubro desde hace 25 años, oficio heredado por su madre. La materia prima la compra en diferentes islas del sur de Chile.
Con el crédito comprará lanas para tejer, aprovechará la temporada de más alta demanda, debido al turismo, comprendido desde noviembre a febrero. 
Comenta que a lo largo de su vida ha podido concretar muchas metas en su negocio.
Gladys vive junto a su marido e hija de 29 años de edad, quien trabaja en el mismo rubro, comenta que toda su familia es comerciante. 
Sus sueños a nivel personal son ampliar su casa.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de los servicios otorgados por Fondo Esperanza, respecto al grupo comenta que las reuniones le han servido para conocerse con los demás emprendedores, por lo que ya se están afiatando.
Puerto Montt es una ciudad del sur de Chile, ubicada en la región de Los Lagos. Una de las atracciones de Puerto Montt son sus bellos paisajes verdes; sus playas poco frecuentadas; su gastronomía y especialmente la reputación de sus pescados y mariscos y sus artesanías. Es también la puerta de entrada a la Isla Grande de Chiloé, rica en tradiciones y leyendas.
texts.en:
This Communal Bank is called “Artesanías del Sur” (Crafts of the South) and consists of 18 entrepreneurs who engage in different businesses such as making knitted crafts, woodworking, selling perfumes, and other activities. All of them are from the city of Puerto Montt.

Gladys is a member of this Communal Bank group. In the photograph, she is on the first row. Gladys is kneeling, wearing a black jacket and jeans, and holding a document and a mobile phone in her hands. She is in the craft business, specifically making knitted items such as scarves, hats, clothes, and other items. Gladys also sells crafts made of wood and leather. She rents a shop in Angelmó (an area known for its artisan fairs and being frequented by tourists). Gladys has been working in this field for 25 years and inherited this business from her mother. Her materials are purchased from different islands in southern Chile. She will use this loan to purchase wool for knitting so that she can take advantage of the season when there is much higher demand as a result of tourism. This period is from November to February.

Gladys says that throughout most of her life she has been able to achieve many goals in her business. She lives with her husband and her 29-year-old daughter who is in the same line of work. Gladys says that all of the members of her family are merchants. Her dreams on a personal level include expanding her house. She is very pleased and grateful for the services provided by Fondo Esperanza. With respect to her group, she says that the meetings have helped her get to know the other entrepreneurs and they have already bonded.

Puerto Montt is a city in southern Chile that is located in the region of Los Lagos. The attractions of Puerto Montt include its beautiful green vistas, but there is little activity on its beaches. The cuisine is well-known for its fish and seafood. The local handicrafts also have a reputation. Puerto Montt also serves as the gateway to Isla Grande de Chiloé, which is rich in traditions and legends.

loans.use: to buy wool for knitting.

loans.name: Lita

texts.es: Lita tiene 36 años, es una mujer alegre, luchadora y emprendedora. Esta separada de su esposo pero vive en casa de sus padres en compañía de ellos, de su hermana y de su tres menores hijos. La actividad que realiza Lita, es la costura, oficio que aprendió viendo a sus amigas. De esa manera decidió hace dos años montar este negocio, y actualmente es muy solicitada por el trabajo que realiza, y por ello ha logrado captar mucha clientela. Además cuenta con el apoyo de su hija mayor, que también está aprendiendo este oficio, y eso le llena de orgullo. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que le ha permitido tener ingresos económicos sustanciales con el cual pueda pagar los gastos propios de su hogar y darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Sin embargo tiene mucho trabajo por hacer que no se da abasto, a pesar que su hija la apoya, por lo que tiene que trabajar hasta muy tarde para poder terminar y entregar los pedidos en la fecha solicitada. Su anhelo es ampliar su negocio, instalando más maquinas de costura y contratar personal. Este sería el primer crédito con MFP, se siente contenta poder contar con un capital de trabajo gracias a la institución, así poder entregar los pedidos que tiene pendiente. Con el préstamo solicitado, lo invertirá en la compra de telas e hilos para costura.
texts.en:
Lita is 36 years old and a cheerful, determined, and enterprising woman. She is separated from her husband, so she lives with her parents in their home along with her sister and her three young children. Lita is a seamstress and learned how to sew by watching her friends. She decided to establish her business two years ago. Lita currently receives many orders for her work and has been able to attract many customers. Her oldest daughter helps her and is learning the trade, which makes her proud. What Lita enjoys most about her work is that it has enabled her to earn income by which she can pay for her own household expenses and provide a better quality of life for her children. Even though she has her daughter to help her, Lita has not been able to cope with the large amount of work. As a result, she has had to work late so that she can finish orders in time to be delivered on the dates requested by her customers. Her wishes are to expand her business, install more sewing machines, and hire workers.

This will be her first loan with MFP. Lita is pleased to have operating capital from the organization so that she can deliver her outstanding orders. The money she requested will be invested in the purchase of fabrics and thread for sewing.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and thread.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Divino Niño Group

texts.es: Alba Justina tiene 45 años, ella forma parte del banco comunal Divino Niño. Quienes además de Alba están Modesta, Lucia, René, Gregoria, Telma, Jardiel, Valentina y Doraldina. Alba se dedica a una pulpería la mayoría de sus clientes llegan a comprar la variedad de productos que ofrece como es granos básicos, detergentes, golosinas, refrescos, sopas, fósforos, papel higiénico y pan además el servicio que le brinda a sus clientes es esmerado. Las demás socias también tienen sus diferentes negocios, es por eso que se han unido para realizar el financiamiento que será utilizado para la compra de materia prima.
texts.en:
Alba Justina is 45 years old and a member of the Communal Bank “Divino Niño” (Divine Child). Joining Alba in this group are Modesta, Lucia, René, Gregoria, Telma, Jardiel, Valentina, and Doraldina.

Alba manages a store. Most of her customers come to buy a variety of products that she offers such as basic grains, detergents, candy, soft drinks, soups, matches, toilet paper, and bread. In addition, the service she provides to her customers is done with great care.

The remaining members also have their own businesses in various areas. For this reason, they have joined together to secure a loan so that they can buy supplies.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, detergents, candy, soft drinks, soups, matches, toilet paper, and bread.

loans.name: Susan

texts.es: Susan tiene 22 años, es una mujer emprendedora y muy alegre. Es soltera pero vive en compañía de sus padres, su hermano, y de su pequeño hijo, por quien se esfuerza por darle un mejor bienestar. La actividad que realiza, es la venta de ropa, mercaderái que trae de la ciudad de Lima, ahí adquiere variedad de ropa y a precios bajos. Asimismo elige aquellos cuyos diseños marcan la moda actual. Es así que dicha prenda es colocada a su clientes dejándo a crédito. Tiene dos años dedicándose a éste negocio, tiempo que le ha valido para hacerse conocida. manifiesta quer el tener este negocio le ha dado el gusto por ser independiente y cubrir sus gastos y velar por su hijo. Sin embargo algunso de sus clientes no le terminan de pagar la mercadería que escogio y eso le atrasa mucho en el negocio. Su mayor anhelo es poder abrir una tienda de venta de ropas. Este sería el primer crédito con la institución MFP, por lo que espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más ropa en mayores cantidades, todas de buena calidad y que sean a la moda.
texts.en:
Susan, age 22, is an enterprising and cheerful woman. She is single and lives with her parents, her brother, and her young son who she strives to give a better well-being. Her business involves selling clothes which she brings in from the city of Lima, where she is able to acquire a variety of merchandise at low prices. Susan tries to choose brand-name designs that are in fashion. When selling these clothes, she extends credit to her customers. She has been in this business for two years and has become recognized during this time.

Susan says that this business has given her a taste for independence since she is able to cover her expenses and provide for her child. However, some of her customers have not completed the payments for their merchandise, so Susan has fallen behind in her business. Her greatest wish is to open a clothing store.

This will be her first loan with MFP. Susan hopes to receive everyone’s support. The amount she requested will be used to buy more clothing in large quantities, all of which will be of good quality and in fashion.

loans.use: to buy clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Marina Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Marina Rosa es casada, tiene 43 años de edad, no tuvo oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 7 hijos los cuales estudian, se dedica a la tejeduría, inició este trabajo como operario y hasta el momento lleva 9 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de hilos de diferentes clases y colores, para poder producir mas, ya que espera en el futuro tener trabajadores para su negocio.
texts.en:
Sra. Marina Rosa is 43 years old, married, and did not have the opportunity to study. She has seven children who are in school. Marina spends her time knitting. She started in this line of work as an operator and now has nine years of experience.

She is requesting a loan to by different types of yarn in various colors so that she can produce more. In the future, she hopes to hire workers for her business.

loans.use: to buy yarn for knitting.

loans.name: Natali

texts.es: Natali tiene 43 años, es una mujer alegre y entusiasta con deseos de superación. Vive en compañía de su pareja y sus tres hijos a los que les quiere dar una mejor calidad de vida y una buena educación. El trabajo que realiza Natali es de alquiler de habitaciones, para lo cual cuenta con una casa propia, lugar que ha ambientado y lo ha convertido en un hospedaje que lleva como nombre "Hospedaje Tentaciones", negocio que tiene ya más de cuatro años y hasta el momento ha contado con el apoyo de su hijo mayor, quien ve en la atención y el cuidado de las habitaciones. Lo que le gusta de esta actividad, es que le permite tener un ingreso económico que le ayuda para solventar los gastos familiares y apoyar a su pareja con los gastos. Ahora tiene planes de ampliar su negocio, construir más habitaciones, comprar más camas y demás enseres propias de una habitación para así dar un mejor servicio a su clientela. Este sería el crédito número ocho con la institución MFP, se siente muy bien y cómoda en el grupo que conforma. Con el préstamo solicitado, comprará más sabanas, y arreglará los servicios higiénicos de las habitaciones que necesitan mantenimiento.
texts.en:
Natali, age 43, is a cheerful and enthusiastic woman who has the desire to succeed. She lives with her partner and their three children, for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life and a good education. Natali’s work involves renting out rooms in her home, which provides a suitable location. Her business has become known for its accommodations and has the name “Hospedaje Tentaciones”.

Natali has been in business for more than four years and currently has the support of her oldest son, who manages and takes care of the rooms. What she enjoys about this business is being able to generate an income that helps with the family expenses so that her partner is not doing it alone. Now she has plans to expand her business by building more rooms, buying more beds, as well as acquiring more furnishings for her own room. This will enable her to provide better service to her customers.

This will be her eighth loan with MFP. Natali feels very good and is comfortable with her group. The loan she requested will be used to buy more bed sheets and to repair the toilets in the rooms that need maintenance.

loans.use: to buy more bed sheets and to repair the toilets in her rental rooms.

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es: Roberto de 34 años de edad, habitante de la comunidad llamada El Rodeo localizada en Pueblo Nuevo municipio Estelí, el es agricultor, es casado, padre de 3 hijos, su nivel académico es básico solo finalizo el cuarto grado de la primaria. El empezó a aprender las labores de agricultura a temprana edad con su papa poco a poco con la ganancia de la venta de su producción de hortalizas  logro comprar su propio terreno, actualmente se dedica a sembrar hortalizas y también a la crianza de ganado. El requiere el préstamo para comprar 2 vaquillas, pues con esta compra podrá mejorar las ventas de leche, pues en esta época la venta de leche tiene mucha demanda y no quiere perder la oportunidad de producir y vender leche. El esta ahorrando para pagar los estudios de sus  hijos para que estos sean profesionales  y salgan adelante esto representa para el su mayor prioridad, le gustaría componer su casa, hacerle mejoras a su finca y ampliar sus áreas de siembra.
texts.en:
Roberto is 34 years old and a resident of the community of El Rodeo, which is located in Pueblo Nuevo in the town of Estelí. He is a farmer who is married and the father of three children. Roberto only has a basic education since he finished elementary school through the fourth grade. He began learning to farm at an early age from his father. Over time, he used his earnings from selling vegetables to buy his own land. Roberto currently grow vegetables and raises cattle.

He is requesting a loan to buy two heifers because he believes this purchase will improve his milk sales. There is great demand this season, so he does not want to lose this opportunity to produce and sell milk. Roberto is saving for his children’s education so that they can become professionals and move forward. Therefore, this has become a high priority. He enjoys home repair projects, making improvements to his farm, and expanding the land on which he grows his crops.

loans.use: to purchase two heifers.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar, sigue laborando en una discoteca de la capital , pero ha tenido mucho cambios en su vida. Anteriormente, vivia con su mama en su pequeña casa, el cual estaba mejorando para el bienestar comun de la familia. Hoy en dia se traslado con su esposa a la casa de su suegro, en donde puso un pequeño negocio de refresqueria y venta de tacos, hamburguesa, tajadas con queso, con el proposito de ahorrar dinero y tener su propia propiedad, dando a su familia estabilidad.
Con este nuevo prestamo podra, invertir mas en el negocio, el cual espera hacer mas cantidad de comida, mas refrescos de sabores, compra de platos, vasos, cucharas, tenedores, manteles, mesas, pequeñas promociones, para llamar la nueva clientela. El cual espera lograr el objetivo y crecer. Por las noches es su esposa quien atiende el negocio, ya que el por las tarde entra a su trabajo, el cual es una entrada fija de ingresos.
texts.en:
Oscar continues to work at a discothèque in the capital, but he has gone through many changes in his life. He previously lived at his mother’s small house, which was better for the common welfare of his family. Today he and his wife have moved to his father-in-law’s house where he has set up a small refreshment stand and snack bar that sells tacos, hamburgers, and fried plantains with cheese. His goal is to save enough money so that he can buy his own property and provide stability for his family.

With this new loan, Oscar will invest more into his business. He hopes to buy greater quantities of food, flavored soft drinks, plates, glasses, spoons, forks, tablecloths, tables, and small advertisements to attract new customers. Oscar hopes to accomplish this goal and grow his business. His wife manages the business at night since he leaves for work in the afternoon. His job provides a fixed source of income.

loans.use: to buy food, soft drinks, plates, glasses, spoons, forks, tablecloths, tables, and pay for small advertisements.

loans.name: Fausta

texts.es: La socia actualmente tiene 74 años D. edad, la socia continua con su negocio D. internet ella tiene su cabina D. internet y ha ido muy bien con lo que pudo ahorrar pago sus servicios y compro algunos pequeños accesorios y el mantenimiento D. las maquinas, la socia también se dedica a realizar tejidos como mantas para la venta ella en esta ocasión desea invertir el prestamo en la compra D. materiales para la elaboración D. las mantas gruesas que la socia realiza, ella desea tener buena cantidad D. tejidos en mantas para la venta en la epoca naviD.ña y tener un ingreso extra para los regalos D. los hijos y los nietos, la socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra D. materiales como lanas D. colores y diferentes grosores para la elaboracion D. mantas.
texts.en: Fausta is now 74 years old, and is continuing to work in her internet cafe business, and it is going very well.  With her savings she was able to pay for her services and buy some small accessories, and do maintenance on her computers.  Fausta also makes knitted items such as blankets to sell.  At this time, she wants to invest the loan in purchasing materials to make the thick blankets that she knits.  She wants to have a good quantity of knitted blankets to sell during the Christmas season, so that she will have extra income to buy gifts for her children and grandchildren.  Fausta requests a loan to invest in materials such as a variety of wool in different colors and weights to use making blankets.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make blankets.

loans.name: Álvaro

texts.es:
El señor Álvaro tiene 32 años de edad, vive con su esposa.
El señor Álvaro, se dedica al comercio de ropa de vestir, junto con su esposa, ambos administran el negocio, tienen  más de 5 años de dedicarse ha esta actividad, la cual la aprendió de un familiar que se dedicaba al comercio de ropa. 

En la actualidad tiene disponible 10 docenas de prendas de vestir como: blusas para damas, camisas para caballero y ropa de bebe. El señor Álvaro antes de dedicarse a esta actividad, cultivaba maíz y frijol

Las compra de  la mercadería las realiza en un departamento de la zona oriental del país, que se encuentra ha 26 kilómetros del lugar donde él vive, en esta cuidad se pueden comprar la ropa ha precio cómodos para su comercialización y también donde él vive en el día del comercio que son los domingos, cuando llegan comerciantes de otras zonas ha vender ropa. 

Don Álvaro solicita un préstamo, a Fundación Campo para comprar: 6 docenas de blusas para damas, 6 docenas de faldas,  6 docenas de camisas para caballeros, 6 docenas de pantalones y  para bebe: pañales, mantillas cuturinas, calcetines, gorros, entre otros más.

Al comprar toda esta ropa contara con mercadería de moda y abastecerá la demanda que tiene en este momento, ya que él tiene un puesto de venta cerca del lugar donde esta el comercio informal de la ciudad. Por lo que tiene una gran demanda y a veces llegan a buscarle y él les dice que no tiene hasta la próxima semana.

 Realizando la inversión él podrá satisfacer la demanda existente y de esta manera venderá más y aumentara sus ingresos. Con estos ingresos, Álvaro comprara un local al interior del mercado municipal o  para alquilar un puesto para establecer su negocio y también desea hacerle mejoras a su vivienda como reparar las puertas y las ventanas de esta. Así mismo desea  adquirir vitrinas donde pueda mostrar sus prendas de vestir, adquiriendo mobiliario para establecer un mini bazar.
texts.en:
Alvaro is 32 years old and lives with his wife.   He and his wife are clothing merchants; they run the business together.  They’ve been in this line of work for over five years having learned from a family member who also was a clothes merchant. He currently has ten dozen articles of clothing like women’s blouses, men’s shirts and infant wear.  Alvaro used to be a corn and bean farmer before going into this business.

He buys his merchandise in a department in the east of the country that’s located 26 kilometers from where he lives.  Clothes to be sold can be bought there at affordable prices and also in his own town on market day, Sunday, when merchants from other zones come to sell clothes.

Alvaro asks Fundación Campo for a loan to buy six dozen women’s blouses, six dozen skirts, six dozen men’s shirts, six dozen pants and for infants: diapers, dresses, blankets, and caps, among others.

By purchasing all this clothing he will have stylish merchandise in stock and he will meet his current demand because he has a sales stand near where the city’s informal commerce takes place so demand is high and sometimes they come looking for something and he has to say that he won’t have it until the next week.

Making this investment will allow him to meet current demand and he will sell more and increase income.  With this income Alvaro will buy an inside stand in the municipal market or rent a stand to set up his business.  He will also do some home improvements like repair its doors and windows.  He also wants to acquire cases to display his clothing and acquire furniture to set up a mini store.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Santos Gumercindo

texts.es:
En Jinotega, conocida como la ciudad delas brumas por sus heladas temperaturas y suelos  fértiles para siembra localizada al norte de Estelí, es originario don Santos, un campesino de 51 años de edad, tienen 4 hijo, casado, a pesar de que su nivel de escolaridad fue muy bajo pues solo termino el segundo grado de la primara don Santos ha salido adelante es agricultor se dedica a la siembra de café y tiene una pequeña pulpería la cual es atendida por su esposa. El inicio en esta actividad a la edad de 10 años de edad ayudando a su tío, el  esta muy agradecido con su tio que se hizo cargo de el pues sus padres murieron cuando tenia 13 años de edad , al casarse se independizo de su tío, gracias a su esfuerzo y arduo  trabajo logro tener su casa , una de sus alegrías según nos comenta es que de sus 4 hijos dos de ellos son profesionales terminaron una carrera universitaria, no fue fácil para el pero todo sacrificio por sus hijos vale la pena.
El requiere el préstamo para mantenimiento de siembra de café, compra de insumos, fertilizantes, pago de mano de obra. Con esta inversión quiere sacar una cosecha de café orgánico con calidad y buenos rendimientos, ya que sus expectativas son ampliar sus áreas de siembra de café y granos básicos. En sus planes futuros esta sembrar dos manzanas de frijoles pero su meta próxima es terminar de preparar a sus demás hijos para que tengan una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Santos, a fifty one year old farmer who is married and has four children, is from Jinotega, the City of Mists, which is known for its freezing temperatures and fertile soil for cultivation, and is located north of the Department of Estelí. Despite having a low level of schooling, only completing second grade in primary school, Santos has gotten ahead as a farmer. He cultivates coffee and has a small general store taken care of by his wife. He started working as a farmer at the age of ten helping his uncle. He is very grateful for his uncle since he took charge of him after his parents died when he was thirteen. When he married he became independent from his uncle, and thanks to hard work and effort, he managed to have his own house. One of his sources of happiness is that of his four children, two of them are professionals with college degrees. It was not easy for him, but every sacrifice for his children is worth the effort. 
He needs the loan to maintain his coffee fields, purchase supplies and fertilizers, and cover labor costs. With this investment, he wants to yield an abundant harvest of quality organic coffee. His expectations are to increase the fields where he cultivates coffee and basic grains. His future plans include planting several acres of beans, but his next goal is to finish preparing his other children to go to college.

loans.use: to maintain coffee fields, purchase supplies and fertilizers, and cover labor costs.

loans.name: Javin

texts.es: Javin tiene 47 años, es un hombre alegre y trabajador. Viven en compañía de su esposa y de sus cinco hijos y por ellos es que desea dar una mejor calidad de vida. La actividad que realiza Javin es la venta de comida en un pequeño puesto que posee en el mercado de su distrito, desde entonces se levanta muy temprano con su esposa para realizar las compras y preparativo de la comida que van a expender. Tiene más de tres meses que realiza éste negocio, por lo que cuenta con el apoyo de un ayudante a quien ha contratado. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que lo realiza en compañía de su esposa, están siempre juntos en todas las decisiones y necesidades. El ingreso económico que le genera le permite solventar los gastos de su hogar y así satisfacer las necesidades de sus hijos. Por tanto desea segir creciendo su negocio, ampliarlo, pues gracias a que la zona donde está ubicado es bastante comercial. Este será el crédito número seis con la institución MFP, se siente bien y cómodo con su grupo del banco comunal, y considera que son personas responsables y solidarias. Con el préstamo solicitado, comprará más utensilios como platos y ollas, y además productos para la preparación de los menús.
texts.en:
Javin is 47, and a cheerful, hard-working man. He lives with his wife and five children, and he wants a better quality of life for them. Javin sells food from a small stand that he owns in the local market. 

He's operated his business for more than three months. Ever since, he and his wife have been getting up very early to make their purchases and prepare the food that they are going to sell. He also has the support of a helper that he has hired. What he likes about his work is that he can do it with his wife. They are always together in all the decisions and chores.

The income that the business generates allows him to pay for his household expenses and so meet his children's needs. So he wishes to keep his business growing, and expand it; as the area where it is located has quite a lot of business activity.

This will be his sixth loan with MFP. He feels very comfortable with his communal bank group, and considers them responsible, supportive people. With the loan he is applying for, he will buy more utensils such as dishes and pots, and also products for preparing the daily meals.

loans.use: To buy more utensils and ingredients for making food.

loans.name: Maria Edi

texts.es: La socia tiene 55 años de edad; la socia se dedica la cuidado de una anciana y a la fabricación de buzos en su taller de confección, la socia se dedcia a ambas actividades en diferentes horarios, ella en esta ocasión requiere el prestamo para invertir en la compra de telas, cierres, hilos entre otros para la elaboración de los buzos al por mayor en su taller de confección.
texts.en:
This member is 55 years old. She takes care of an elderly person and operates a sewing workshop where she makes track suits. The member engages in both activities on different schedules.

On this occasion, she is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of fabrics, zippers, thread, and other supplies for making track suits in mass quantities within her workshop.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, zippers, thread, and other supplies.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es: Judith tiene 24 años, es una mujer muy amable y alegre. Vive en compañía de su pareja y de su menor hijo en su casa construida en el terreno de sus padres, quienes le brindaron un espacio para ella y su familia. El trabajo que realiza, es la venta de ropa de diversos modelos, mercadería que trae desde la ciudad de Lima. Tiene una amiga que le envía dichas prendas por encomienda, de esa manera se ahorra el gasto de viaje. Su productos son vendidos a familiares, amistades y vecinos, clientes que ha logrado mantenerlos durante cuatro años, y cada tiempo aumenta la clientela. Considera que gracias a éste trabajo puede apoyar a su pareja con los gastos del hogar, sin embargo parte de éste negocio es contar con clientes morosos que siempre demoran en pagar. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo y abrir una tienda de venta de ropa, que le permita tener mayores ingresos económicos y ser una prospera empresaria. Este sería el crédito número seis con la institución MFP, se siente bien y cómoda con su grupo comunal, pues considera personas responsables. Con le monto solicitado, lo invertirá en la compra de ropa en mayor cantidad.
texts.en:
Judith, age 24, is a friendly and cheerful woman. She lives with her partner and their young son in a house they built on her parents’ land. This area provides space for her and her family. Judith sells different styles of clothing. She brings in her merchandise from the city of Lima. Judith has a friend who ships the clothing to her so that she can save on travel expenses. Her products are sold to relatives, friends, and neighbors. She has managed to accumulate customers over the course of four years and her clientele is growing. Thanks to her work, she has been able to help her partner with the household expenses. However, she has some customers who are delinquent because they are slow in making their payments. Her greatest wish is to continue growing so that she can open a clothing store. This would enable her to generate more income and become a successful entrepreneur.

This will be her sixth loan with MFP. Judith feels very good and is comfortable with her Communal Bank group. She considers the other members to be responsible people. The amount she requested will be invested in the purchase of clothing in bulk quantities.

loans.use: to buy clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Henry Uriel

texts.es: El señor Henry de 40 años de edad, es originario  de la comunidad llamada el Zapote localizada en Limay municipio de Estelí, es casado, tiene 4 hijos de 21,17 ,12 ,2 años de edad respectivamente, todos ellos están estudiando excepto su hijo mas pequeño. Don Henry  es comerciante y agricultor. El oficio de agricultor lo aprendió  desde muy pequeño pues su padre le enseño  a sembrar, el estudio hasta tercer año de la secundaria, ya que se dedico a trabajar, se caso , el mantiene a su familia. Hoy en día tiene su terreno propio donde siembra hortalizas tales como tomate, cebolla, chiltoma, granos básicos y se dedica a la crianza de ganado esta actividad es su segunda fuente ingresos pues a veces las ventas de la hortalizas son bajas y con la venta de ganado se ayuda para pagar los gastos y mejorar los ingresos. El requiere el préstamo para mantenimiento de su finca, comprar herramientas tales como chapia, alambres, compra de semilla para mejorar el pasto para el ganado. Este inversión le ayudara  a poner cerco alrededor de su finca, comprar semillas para pastos y mejorarlas condiciones de crianza y calidad  de su ganado. Su principal meta es garantizarles el alimento y estudios a sus hijos, seguir trabajando cada día para mejorar poco a poco su finca.
texts.en:
Sr. Henry is 40 years old and originally from the community of Zapote, which is located in Limay in the town of Estelí. He is married and has four children (ages 21, 17, 12, and 2). All of them are studying except for his youngest child. Don Henry is a merchant and farmer. He learned how to farm at a young age from his father, who taught him how to plant crops. Henry studied through the third year of high school. He has been dedicated to his work ever since he got married because it helps him to support his family. Today Henry has his own land on which he grow vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, peppers, as well as basic grains. He also raises cattle as a second source of income whenever his vegetable sales are low. Selling cattle help to pay his expenses and improve his income.

Henry is requesting a loan so that he can maintain his farm. He plans to buy supplies such as weed killer, barbed wire, and seeds to improve the pastures for his cattle. This investment will help him put up a fence around his farm, buy seeds for his pastures, and improve the development and quality of his cattle. His main goal is to feed and educate his children. Therefore, Henry wants to continue working each day to gradually improve his farm.

loans.use: to buy weed killer, barbed wire, and grass seed so that he can improve his farm.

loans.name: Froilan

texts.es: El socio continua con su negocio de compra y venta de frazadas, el socio suele comprar de las fabricas en Juliaca y los lleva a vender en las provincias de Sicuani, Calca, Pisac, Iscuchaca y cuando hay ferias el lleva  a las ferias, el socio también vende en Cusco en uno de los mercados en la zona sur, el socio actualmente desea invertir el credito en la compra de sábanas para incrementar sus ventas el socio ahora comprara frazadas y sábanas al por mayor para llevarlas a vender a sus conocidos mercados y ferias en las provincias mencionadas. El socio desea dar a sus hijos y conyugue una muy buena calidad de vida y mejorar su vivienda, El socio solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de frazadas y sábanas para la venta.
texts.en:
The member continues with his business of buying and selling blankets.  The member buys his products from the factories in Juliaca and carries them with him to sell in the provinces of Sicuani, Calca, Pisac, and Iscuchaca whenever fairs are held.  He also sells in Cusco at one of the markets in the southern district.  The member currently wants to invest this loan in the purchase of bed sheets to increase his sales.  He now buys blankets and bed sheets in bulk so that he can bring them to the well-known markets and fairs in the provinces mentioned previously.  

The member wants to give his children and wife a good quality of life and make improvements to his home.  Therefore, he is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of blankets and bed sheets for resale.

loans.use: to buy blankets and bed sheets.

loans.name: Mardelia

texts.es: Mardelia tiene 60 años, vive sola en su casa que es de su propiedad. Sus hijos ocasionalmente la visitan en compañía de sus nietos, dándole a ella la alegría de verlos crecer. La actividad que realiza Mardelia es la venta de abarrotes de primera necesidad, negocio que lo realiza en su bodega ubicada en los espacios de casa, desde entocnes atiende a sus vecinos. Tiene 15 años trabajando en su tienda, y hasta el momento lo ha hecho sola, pero han habido ocasiones en que sus hijos la apoyaban cuando estaba de visita en su casa. Lo que le gusta de esta actividad es que le ha permitido, por muchos años solventar los gastos de su hogar, así como brindarles una educación a sus hijos, que son su orgullo, comenta además, lo bien que se siente al sentirse productiva. Considera rentable su negocio, por la rotación que tiene los productos y dándole una buena administración. Este sería el primer crédito con la institución MFP, se siente bien y cómoda con el grupo comunal el cual forma parte, y espera poder seguir recibiendo el apoyo de la institución. Con el monto solicitado, lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes al por mayor, como aceites, azúcar, y demás, para poder mantener su bodega.
texts.en:
Mardelia is 60 years old and lives alone in her own home. Her children and grandchildren occasionally visit her, so it gives her great joy to see them grow. Mardelia sells groceries and basic necessities. Her business is located in her home, so she is able to serve her neighbors. She has managed her store for 15 years and currently works alone, but occasionally her children will help out whenever they come to visit her. What she enjoys about this business is having been able to cover her household expenses over the years as well as provide an education for her children. She is proud of this achievement. In addition, she says working makes her feel productive. Mardelia considers her business to be profitable because she is able to manage the turnover of her products.

This will be her first loan with MFP. Mardelia feels good and is comfortable with the Communal Bank group that she has joined. She hopes to continue receiving support from the organization. The amount she requested will be used to buy groceries in bulk such as oil, sugar, and other products, so that she can maintain her store.

loans.use: to buy oil, sugar, and other products in bulk.

loans.name: Benedicta

texts.es: La socia tiene actualmente 53 años de edad; la socia en la actualidad continua con su negocio de elaboración de comidas caseras para la venta sus principales clientes son los taxistas, la socia prepara los diferentes potajes que constan en una sopa a base de verduras y carne, el segundo  que es un seco, y el postre y el refresco, la socia ya tiene a sus clientes frecuentes y les brinda el servicio desde hace ya 1 año, la soica también se dedica a la compra y venta de quesos, chocolates, café, ella tieen la venta de estos productos junto a su tienda de abarrotes pequeña en casa. La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus diferentes potajes y una parte del ingreso invertira en la compra de chocolates, cafe, quesos para la venta.
texts.en:
This member is currently 53 years old. She continues with her business of making homemade meals for sale. Her main customers are taxi drivers.

The member prepares different dishes that consist of a soup made with vegetables and meat, a main course, a dessert, and a soft drink. She has frequent customers for whom she has been providing this service. For the past year, she has also been buying and selling cheeses, chocolates, and coffee. She offers these products for sale from a small store in her home.

The member is requesting a loan to buy supplies for preparing her various dishes. Part of her income will be invested in the purchase of chocolates, coffee, and cheeses for resale.

loans.use: to buy supplies for preparing her dishes.

loans.name: Martha Esther

texts.es:
Martha es una joven de 22 años de edad, de oficio operaria de cocina, pues este trabajo le impulso para poner en su casa de sus padres una pequeña venta de tacos, enchiladas,repochetas, hamburguesa, gaseosa, quien comenzo con dinero propio, y ayuda de sus papa. El horario que tiene en su trabajo es variado, es por tal razon le dedica tiempo  a la venta.
Lo que ella desea es poder mejorar la casa donde vive, en el cambio del zinc, cambiar porton de verja y hacer las ventanas con verjas, ya que estan bastante desgatadas por la lluvia y sol. Y tener una mejor imagen para su ventas, tambien en mejores condiciones de seguridad  a sus padres ante la delicuencia.
texts.en:
Martha is a young woman who is 22 years of age. She works as a kitchen operator. Since she has experience in this type of work, Martha decided to open a small food stand in her parents’ home where she sells tacos, enchiladas, “repochetas” (pan fried tortillas with cheese), hamburgers, and sodas. She started this business with her own money and the help of her father. Her work schedule varies, but she makes time to sell.

What she wants is to improve the home in which she lives. Martha plans to replace the zinc roofing sheets, the wrought iron gate, and to make new security bars for the windows since the existing ones have deteriorated in the rain and sun. This will give her home a better image for making sales. She will also have better conditions that will protect her parents against crime.

loans.use: to replace the zinc sheeting on the roof and install a wrought iron gate and new security bars on the windows.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es: La socia continua con el negocio de compra y ve ta de ropa ella trae ropa al por mayor y vende en uno de los mas conocidos mercados en la ciudad, ella también trae ropa para niños y adultos en esta ocasión la socia requiere el prestamo para invertir en la compra de ropa al por mayor ya que se vienen las fiestas navideñas y desea el prestamo para invertir en la compra de ropas de temporada para niños y adultos.
texts.en:
This member continues with her business of buying and selling clothes. She acquires the clothes wholesale and the sells them at one of the most well-known markets in the city. She also brings in children’s clothes as well as those for adults.

On this occasion, the member is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of wholesale clothing since the Christmas holidays are approaching. She wants this loan so that she can invest in seasonal clothing for children and adults.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothing for children and adults.

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es:
La señorita es soltera, tiene 22 años de edad, cursó los estudios de educación básica, se dedica al comercio de chamarra de diferentes diseños, inicio este negocio como operaria y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia.

Decide solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para ampliar el capital de trabajo ya que va a comprar mas mercadería consistente en chamarras, en el futuro espera contar con más capital.
texts.en:
This young lady is 22 years of age, single, and finished her basic education. She has a business of selling jackets of various designs. She started out working as an operator and now has three years of experience.

She decided to request a loan to increase her operating capital. She plans to buy more merchandise, consisting of jackets. In the future, she hopes to have more capital.

loans.use: to buy jackets.

loans.name: Silda

texts.es: Silda tiene 28 años, es una mujer trabajadora, dinámica  y alegre. Vive en compañía de su pareja y de sus tres hijos, a los que quiere mucho. Juntos habitan en su casa que es de su propiedad, que logró comprar con mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza Silda, es la venta de plátanos, contado para esto con un pequeño puesto de ventas en el mercado de su distritio. Es así que se levanta desde muy temprano y se dirige al puerto fluvial  Miguel Grau, en donde espera la llegada de los productores y es a ellos a quienes compra sus productos para luego llevarlo al mercado. Tiene más de tres años dedicándose a esta actividad y hasta el momento ha contado siempre con la ayuda de su pareja, quien atiende a los clientes. Gracias a su negocio es que ha logrado ayudar en la economía de su hogar, sin embargo es un trabajo que requiere mucho sacrificio pues tiene que levantarse de madrugada, pero es necesario si desea salir adelante. Ella espera mas adelante incrementar su capital de trabajo y así comprar y vender en mayores volúmenes. Este seria el primer crédito con la institución MFP, se siente muy a gusto con el grupo comunal ya que todos se han mostrado muy solidarios con ella. Con el monto solicitado, lo invertirá en la compra de más plátanos para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Silda is 28 years old and a hardworking, dynamic, and cheerful woman. She lives with her partner and their children who she loves dearly. They have their own home which they were able to buy after much effort. Silda sells bananas. She has her own vending stand at the market in her district. Silda wakes up very early so that she can get to the Miguel Grau river port and wait for her products to arrive. After she buys her products, she takes them to market. Silda has been in this business for more than three years and currently has the support of her partner, who helps with attending to the customers. Thanks to her business, she has been able to help with the household finances. However, her work requires great sacrifice since she must wake up at dawn, but it is necessary if she wants to succeed. Going forward, she hopes to increase her operating capital so that she can buy and sell in greater volumes.

This will be her first loan with MFP. Silda is very comfortable working with her Communal Bank since all the members have been very supportive of her. The amount she requested will be invested in the purchase of more bananas so that she can restock her business.

loans.use: to buy bananas.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Buscando El Triunfo Group

texts.es:
Kimberly  es una de las integrantes de Banco Mujer Buscando El Triunfo, tiene 26 años y vive con su esposo,  tiene pocos meses de casada, ella se ha fijado muchas metas que desea alcanzar, por eso trabajan muy duro para lograrlo. Todavía no quiere tener hijos, porqué quiere terminar sus estudios superiores y mejorar la condición económica para poder darles calidad de vida a sus hijos. 
Este es el segundo crédito que solicita a Fundación Mujer, y está muy conforme con los servicios que le brinda, el préstamo lo va a invertir en la compra de zapatos que es lo que ella vende en la zona de Talamanca donde vive.
El crédito es de gran ayuda para ella ya que le ha permitido tener variedad de zapatos para ofrecer, aumentar sus ventas, y generar un ingresos extra para ayudarle a su esposo a cubrir los gastos del hogar. 
En el grupo con Kimberly están, Yolanda, Berta, Delia Y Jeanneth, que van invertir en actividades comerciales y cría de pollos.
texts.en:
