El Sr. Victor, tiene 41 años de edad, tiene 15 años de casado, vive en una aldea de San Francisco de Yojoa, junto a su esposa y 3 hijos, de 5, 13 y 17 años, quienes estan estudiando.

Don victor y su esposa se ayudan mutuamente y tienen 20 años de dedicarse a la agricultura al cultivo de maiz, frijol y patastillo, y vende el grano en cada cosecha. A esta actividad le dedica todo el dia y todos los dias. Esta actividad la realiza desde niño, porque sus padres son agricultores. ellos tienen un area de terreno cultivado como de 2 manzanas.y esta produccion es vendida a compradores de granos que llegan a su casa a comprarlo, y cuando hay abundancia en la zona, le toca sacarlo hacia el mercado para la venta. 
El prestamo que solicito es para invertir en el cultivo de maiz, en preparacion de tierra y mantenimiento.
Sus esfuerzos son para mantener un nivel de vida mejor y que sus hijos continuen estudiando.
texts.en:
Victor is 41 years old and married.  He lives with his wife and three children; age 5, 13, and 17, in the San Francisco de Yojoa village.  The children attend school.

Victor and his wife help each other.  For 20 years they have devoted themselves to growing corn, beans, and cacao.  They sell the grain at each harvest.  They work at this business activity all day, every day.  He has been doing this since he was a young boy because his parents are farmers.  They have an area of cultivated land that is two “manzanas” (a land measurement unit equivalent to 7000 square meters or 1.728 acres).  This production is sold to grain buyers who come to his house to purchase the grains.  When there is abundance in the area he takes it to the market to sell.

The loan that he requested is to invest in growing corn and for the preparation and maintenance of the land.  He makes his efforts in order to support a better standard of living and for his children to continue their education.

loans.use: to grow corn and to the prepare and maintain the land.

loans.name: Amkeni Group

texts.en:
Receive greetings from Amkeni Group in Western Kenya! Joan is the facilitator of the Amkeni group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Joan takes care of six children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Joan had a good maize yield harvesting six bags on 1/2 an acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Joan was only able to harvest four bags of maize on 1/2 an acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Joan and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from her maize sales, Joan will invest in livestock rearing and ensure food security for her family.

In 2012, the members of Amkeni group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

She is pictured in the photograph with her group members.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María Del Carmen se dedica a la venta de huevos y gallina. Hace más de 16 años que tiene este medio de vida. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de huevos, en el tiempo de verano los productos suben de precio por lo que necesita esta inversión para complacer a sus clientes. Ella es una persona muy responsable y además es una madre abnegada tiene 2 hijos bajo su cargo que los ha mantenido con mucho esfuerzo.
texts.en: María Del Carmen sells eggs and hens.  She has had this business for more than 16 years.  She is requesting a loan to purchase eggs. Prices for products increase in the summer, so she needs this loan to satisfy her customers.  She is very responsible person and a self-sacrificing mother with 2 children whom she has supported with her hard work.

loans.use: to purchase eggs.

loans.name: Sikulu Multi Purpose Group

texts.en:
Receive greetings from Sikulu Multi Purpose Group in Western Kenya! Dorcas is the facilitator of the group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Dorcas takes care of five children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to have additional maize profits to educate her children, access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Dorcas had a good maize yield harvesting eight bags on 1/2 acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Dorcas was only able to harvest four bags of maize on 1/2 acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Dorcas and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from her maize sales, Dorcas will educate her children and invest in livestock rearing.

In 2012, the members of Sikulu Multi Purpose group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

She is pictured in the photograph with her group members.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Bidossessi Group

texts.fr: Le groupement BIDOSSESSI est formé de douze personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Damienne est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Damienne est âgée de 52 ans, et est mère de deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à sa charge. Damienne a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire. Depuis une dizaine d’année, Damienne vend des tissus par le système de distribution ; ce qui lui permet d'assurer sans difficulté les diverses charges de ses enfants et de subvenir à ses besoins. Damienne s'approvisionne au Bénin et au Togo. C’est la deuxième fois que Damienne et les autres membres du groupement BIDOSSESSI sollicitent un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce crédit leur permettra de renforcer leur activité et d'accroître leur fonds de roulement, afin de mieux répondre à la demande de leur clientèle.
texts.en:
The Bidossessi group consists of twelve people living in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group, named Damienne, is the one whose hand is raised in the photo.

Damienne is 52 years old and the mother of two children, both attending (or having attended) school and living under her care. She interrupted her own education at high school level.

For the past ten years, Damienne has been selling clothing fabrics through the distribution system. This allows her to easily meet her children's various needs and also to support herself. Damienne gets her supplies in Benin and from neighboring Togo.

This is the second time that Damienne and the other members of the Bidossessi group have sought a credit loan from Alida. This loan will allow them to strengthen their business activities and increase their working capital in order to better meet the needs of their customers.

loans.use: Buy fabrics.

loans.name: Reina Mariela

texts.es:
Reina, es comerciante de lencería, su familia está conformada por su esposo y un hijo de 8 años de edad, ella se dedica a vender lencería por medio de revistas, la forma de vender es visitando a los clientes, en sus viviendas o trabajos, para ofrecer los productos de revistas, haciendo los pedidos por la cantidad de encargos que los clientes hagan.
Por el momento tiene realizado un pedido algo fuerte de lencería, para esto solicita un préstamo para pagar a los proveedores el monto por el pedido, luego de distribuirlo a los clientes y recibir el pago de ellos.
Este préstamo le ayudara para realizar la compra y darle seguimiento a los clientes, su aspiración es comprarse en un lapso de tiempo, su propia casa.
texts.en:
Reina sells lingerie.  Her family is made up of her husband and one son, age 8. She sells lingerie through magazines.  She visits customers at their homes or at work and offers them products via magazine.  She then places the orders for items her customers have requested.   

She as a large lingerie order, so she is requesting a loan to pay her supplier the amount for the order. She will then deliver the merchandise to her customers and receive payment from them. 

This loan will help her make her purchase and attend to her customers.  She hopes to eventually be able to buy her own home.

loans.use: to purchase lingerie.

loans.name: Green Pull M Group

texts.en:
Receive greetings from Green Pull M Group in Western Kenya! It is headed by Wycliffe as their facilitator. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Wycliffe is a father of four children. He joined One Acre Fund in order to grow enough to ensure food security for his family and make additional maize profits to educate his children. In the recent 2011 season, Wycliffe had an excellent maize yield harvesting 12 bags on one acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Wycliffe was only able to harvest one bag of maize on one acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Wycliffe and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from his maize sales, Wycliffe will educate his children and invest in business.

In 2012, the members of Green Pull M group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

He is pictured in the photograph with his group members.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Lukhuna Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Lukhuna A Group in Western Kenya! Patrick is the facilitator of the Lukhuna A group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Patrick takes care of seven children at home. He joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for his family. In the recent 2011 season, Patrick had a very good maize yield harvesting 16 bags on one acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Patrick was only able to harvest seven bags of maize on one acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Patrick and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from his maize sales, Patrick will educate his children, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.

In 2012, the members of Lukhuna A group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

He is pictured with his group members in the photograph.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Zenaida Del Carmen

texts.es:
Zenaida, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, sus hijos aun son dependientes, Ella aprendió el oficio desde muy joven, como un oficio doméstico, pero al formar su familia, el dedicarse a hacer tortillas fue una fuente de ingreso para su familia.
Actualmente necesita comprar insumos como Maíz, leña y gas, esta compra le ayudara para mantener lo necesario en el negocio y poder continuar con la producción de tortillas.
El sueño de Zenaida es tener un negocio con más capacidad, aumentar su clientela y proveer para sus hijos lo necesario.
texts.en:
Zenaida earns a living selling tortillas. She lives with her husband and three dependent children. She was taught to make tortillas at home at a young age, but once she had a family, she worked at making tortillas to provide a source of income for her family.

She currently needs to buy supplies such as corn, firewood and gas. These purchases will provide her with what her business needs and allow her to keep making tortillas.

It is Zenaida's dream to expand her business, increase her clientele and provide for the needs of her children.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood and gas to make tortillas.

loans.name: Sikulu Reformed B Group

texts.en:
Receive greetings from Sikulu Reformed B Group in Western Kenya! With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Pharis and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

Pharis is the facilitator of the group. He is in the photograph with his group members. Pharis takes care of three children at home. He joined One Acre Fund in order to grow enough to feed his family and have additional maize profits to educate his children. In the recent 2011 season, Pharis had an excellent maize yield harvesting 15 bags on 1/2 an acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Pharis was only able to harvest one bag of maize on 1/2 an acre of land. With income from maize sales, Pharis will educate his children, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.

This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program. In 2012, the members of Sikulu Reformed B group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Mirian Del Socorro

texts.es: Mirian Del Socorro de 56 años. Su negocio es una pulpería, lo inicio aproximadamente hace 7 años. Su negocio está ubicado en su vivienda, la mayoría de sus clientes se encuentran satisfechos con el servicio que ella ofrece. Su horario inicia a las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche, de lunes a viernes. Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, pan, jabón, fósforos y sopas. Su sueño es poder crecer poco a poco con su local.
texts.en:
Mirian Del Socorro is 56 years old. 

She has a grocery store which she opened about 7 years ago. Her business is located in her home. Most of her customers are satisfied with the service that she offers. She starts at 7:00AM in the morning working until 9:00PM in the evening from Monday through Friday.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy basic grains, candy, drinks, bread, soap, matches and soups. Her dream is to be able to grow her home business little by little.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, candy, drinks, bread, soap, matches and soups

loans.name: Olivia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Olivia, es comerciante de ropa, vive con familia y sus 5 hijos. La venta de ropa la realiza de manera ambulante, lleva tres años en el negocio y este surgió por iniciativa propia, para mantener en el hogar todo lo necesario.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de blusas, camisas, short, esta inversión le permitirá mejorar tanto el negocio como sus ingresos familiares, ofreciendo a la clientela prendas de vestir nuevas en otros estilos.
Su aspiración es tener un mejor negocio, que sea estable y contar con un local fijo, dando así una mejor condición de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Olivia sells clothing.  She lives with her family and her 5 children and sells clothing door to door.  She has had this business for 3 years, which she started on her own initiative to provide her household with the necessities.  

She is requesting a loan to purchase blouses, shirts, and shorts. This loan will help her to improve her business and her family income, offering her customers new clothing items in different styles.  

Her dream is to have a better business, one that is stable and with a shop, so that she can provide her children with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, shirts, shorts.

loans.name: Bidii S H G Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Bidii SHG Group in Western Kenya! Mary is the facilitator of the Bidii SHG group. Mary is the mother of three children. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Mary had an excellent maize yield harvesting 7 bags on 1/2 an acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Mary was only able to harvest one bag of maize on 1/2 an acre of land. With income from maize sales, Mary will educate her children, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.

This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program. In 2012, the members of Bidii SHG group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Mary and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

Mary is pictured with her group members in the photograph.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Wendy Arely

texts.es:
Wendy, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, tiene 4 años en el negocio, lo administra en su casa, donde ha hecho un corralito para tenerlos encerrados; Wendy vive con dos hijos de 3 y 1 año de edad, también vive con su esposo, ya que junto a él iniciaron con la crianza de los cerdos.
Wendy está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de dos cerdos, ya que se le presenta la oportunidad de realizar la compra, esta inversión le dará un aumento en el negocio, continuando en el trabajo para proveer para su familia lo necesario.
texts.en:
Wendy breeds pigs. She has been in the business for 4 years. She keeps her pigs at home, where she has a pig pen to keep them enclosed.

Wendy lives with two children, 3 years and 1 year old. She also lives with her husband and together they began the breeding of pigs. 

Wendy is asking for a loan in order to buy two pigs. She already has the opportunity to make a purchase, and this loan will increase her business, keeping her in work in order to provide the family necessities.

loans.use: to buy two pigs

loans.name: Sikulu Reformed A Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Sikulu Reformed A Group in Western Kenya! Solomon is the facilitator of the Sikulu Reformed A group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Solomon is a father of three children. He joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for his family. In the recent 2011 season, Solomon had an excellent maize yield harvesting 17 bags on one acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Solomon was only able to harvest eight bags of maize on one acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Solomon and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from maize sales, Solomon will educate his children, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.

In 2012, the members of Sikulu Reformed A group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

He is pictured with his group members in the photograph.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Alex Omar

texts.es:
El señor Alex tiene 37 años de edad y vive en la aldea rural de Tapikilares en el municipio de San Francisco Yojoa. Lleva 15 años de casado con su esposa Mirna y la pareja tiene 3 hijos de 15, 13 y 2 años de edad. 

Alex se dedica al cultivo de maíz y actualmente cultiva dos manzanas de tierra. Aprendió el oficio de sus padres, los cuales eran agricultores. Alex se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde que fue niño y  continúa esa actividad heredada para mejorar su nivel de vida familiar. Sus hijos también colaboran en las actividades agrícolas cuando no están estudiando. 

Normalmente después de la cosecha, Alex se lleva el maíz al mercado para vender y negociar. Cuando hay abundancia de maíz, los precios bajan. Cuando hay escasez, Alex no tiene que ir al mercado porque los compradores salgan a buscar maíz en comunidades como el suyo. Alex se aprovecha para subir sus precios y así recibe mejores ingresos. 

Alex va a utilizar este crédito de L5000 para invertir en el cultivo. Es el primer crédito que él maneja. El espera continuar la actividad agrícola para terminar de educar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Alex, age 37, lives in the rural village of Tapikilares in the San Francisco Yojoa municipality.  He has been married to his wife, Mirna, for 15 years.  The couple has three children; ages 15, 13, and 2.

Alex grows corn, and he currently has two “manzanas” (a land measurement unit equivalent to 7000 square meters or 1.728 acres) of land.  He learned this trade from his parents, who were farmers.  Alex has devoted himself to farming since he was a boy.  He continues with this business activity that he inherited in order to improve his family’s standard of living.  His children also participate in the farming activities when they are not in school.

After the harvest Alex usually takes the corn to the market to sell and to trade.  When there is an abundance of corn the prices drop.  When there is a scarcity, Alex does not have to go to the market because the buyers come to look for corn in communities like his.  Alex takes advantage of this to raise his prices and get better income.

Alex will use this loan for 5,000 lempiras to invest in farming.  This is the first loan that he has managed.  He hopes to continue with the farming activity in order to finish educating his children.

loans.use: to invest in growing corn.

loans.name: Ivania Del Carmen

texts.es: Ivania Del Carmen de 48 años. Tiene su negocio que es una pulpería, Desde hace 22 años aproximadamente ella se ha dedicado a la venta de productos que se utilizan diariamente como leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún y de bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en su misma vivienda para su comodidad y seguridad, con las ganancias que adquiera por la venta de sus productos trata de cubrir todos sus gastos y mejorar su calidad de vida. Este es crédito para comprar más mercadería como productos de primera necesidad.
texts.en:
Ivania Del Carmen is 48 years old. For the past 22 years, she has run a grocery store  selling everyday items such as milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna and beverages.  For  better security and convenience, she runs the business from her own home. 

With the profit she makes from the sale of her products, she tries to cover all her expenses and  improve her quality of life. 

This loan is to buy more supplies, such as  basic food products.

loans.use: to buy milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna and beverages.

loans.name: Muungano B Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Muungano B Group in Western Kenya! Rose is the facilitator of the Muungano B group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Rose takes care of four children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Rose had an excellent maize yield harvesting 12 bags on 3/4 acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Rose was only able to harvest one bag of maize on 3/4 acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Rose and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from her maize sales, Rose will educate her children, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.

In 2012, the members of Muungano B group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

She is pictured with her group members in the photograph.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 4 y un año de edad; Víctor se dedica a la agricultura, tiene 15 años de estar cultivando maíz y frijol, este oficio le ha permitido tener los ingresos necesarios para su familia, ya que las cosechas cuando son abundantes, logra dividir una parte para alimentación familiar y otra para vender.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de abono y herbicidas, para aplicarlos en la milpa, con los fondos de este préstamo podrá comprar los insumos y poder aplicar en el cultivo para tener una buena y sana cosecha.
El propósito de Víctor es trabajar por su familia, sacando sus hijos adelante y en un futuro poderlos preparar académicamente.
texts.en:
Víctor lives with his wife and two children who are 4 years and one year old. Víctor works in agriculture. For 15 years he has been growing corn and beans. This work has permitted him to have the necessary income for his family, as when the crops are abundant, he is able to share a part with his family for food and other purchases.

He is asking for a loan in order to buy fertilizer and herbicides in order to use them in the corn fields, and with the money from this loan he can buy supplies and be able to apply it in the crops in order to have a good and healthy harvest.

Víctor’s goal is to provide for his family, pushing his children forward towards an academic future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides

loans.name: Webanania Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Webanania Group in Western Kenya! Jane is the facilitator of the Webanania SHG group. This  group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Jane takes care of six children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Jane had an excellent maize yield harvesting five bags on 1/2 acre of land. Before joining One Ace Fund, Jane was only able to harvest two bags of maize on 1/2 acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Jane and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from her maize sales, Jane will educate her children, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.

In 2012, the members of Webanania SHG group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

loans.use: To source farming inputs such as seeds and fertilizer at low prices for the 2012 planting season

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan, vive con su grupo familiar, su esposa y 5 hijos, todos son dependientes, Juan por su parte se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, de este pequeño negocio logra recibir ganancias para solventar las necesidades del hogar, este trabajo requiere dedicación, para mantener gordos y sanos a los cerdos, esto lo aprendió de su padre.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de sacos de concentrado, para alimentar a los cerdos, esta compra será muy útil para Juan, ya que por el momento se encuentra este producto subiendo de precio, así podrá comprar varios sacos, con lo que pueda cubrir el dinero del préstamo, para almacenarlo y tener para la granja.
La aspiración de Juan es tener una granja sana y bien alimentada, un crecimiento en su comercio y poder tener para su familia una mejor solvencia económica.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his family consisting of his wife and five children who are all dependent on him.  Juan raises pigs.  From this small business he’s able to earn profits to cover household expenses.  The work requires a certain amount of dedication to maintain the pigs fat and healthy; he learned this from his father.  

At present, he’s requesting a loan to buy sacks of feed concentrate for the pigs.  This purchase will be very useful for Juan because at the moment the price of this product is rising and he’ll be able to buy several sacks with the amount of the loan and store them to have available for his farm.  Juan’s hope is to have a healthy, well fed farm, to grow in the marketplace and to have his family in better economic solvency.

loans.use: to buy feed concentrate for his pigs.

loans.name: Melania De Jesus

texts.es: Melania De Jesús se dedica a la venta de ropa, desde hace mas de 20 años ella siempre ha sido una persona responsable. La mayoría de sus clientes saben donde ella tiene localizado el negocio por lo que llegan a buscar los diferentes productos que ofrece, pues en su comarca no existe una tienda de ropa y aprovecho la oportunidad de establecer este negocio. el financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, trajes, faldas, vestidos y ropa para niños.
texts.en: Melania De Jesús has sold clothes for more than twenty years; she’s always been a responsible person.  Most of her customers know where her business is located so they come by looking for the various items she offers because in the area there is no other clothing store and she took advantage of this opportunity to establish this business.  The loan she’s requesting is to buy pants, shirts, suits, skirts, dresses and children’s clothes.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Jose Eriberto

texts.es:
José, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo porque quiere fortalecer el negocio, creciendo con la granja de cerdos, él administro bien el préstamo anterior, pago puntualmente, realizo el cultivo y de las cosechas una parte la vendio a buen precio y por el momento la solicitud es para comprar 3 cerdos más.
Con la compra quiere aumentar la disponibilidad de esta especie y continuar proveyendo para su familia todo lo necesario, ya que poco a poco con el apoyo de los préstamos, su condición esta cambiando.
texts.en: José is requesting a new loan because he wants to strengthen his business.  He has a pig sty that is expanding.  He managed his previous loan successfully and repaid it on time.  José completed the harvesting of his crops, part of which was sold at a good price.  At the moment, this loan request will be used to buy three more pigs.  With this purchase, he wants to increase his availability of pigs so that he can continue to provide his family everything they need.  With the support of these loans, his condition will be transformed over time.

loans.use: to buy three pigs.

loans.name: Eveling Violeta

texts.es:
Doña Eveling, sigue en el comercio de sus venta de ropa y cosmetico, asi mismo con el alquiler de cuartos, en donde ha sido de gran beneficios para solventar sus gastos.
Y que es atraves de los pretamos que ha venido creciendo, al poder darle un mejor acondicionamiento a los cuartos de alquiler, con su credito anterior logro abanzar banstante con el muro ya que es grande el terreno, solo una parte pequeña quedo forrada con zinc ya.
Tiene material comprado, de la ganancias des sus ventas y ayuda de remesas de sus hijos, que siguen laborando en Costa Rica, pero que no continuo el muro, ya que lo hara despues, ya que su objetivo es la construccion de otro cuarto, para alquiler y luego terminar el muro, que tambien es de gran  pioridad. Ya que su meta es poder tener mas ingresos, para cuando su familia regrese totalmente al pais, y solventar los gastos.
texts.en:
Doña Eveling continues in her business of selling clothing and cosmetics. At the same time, she rents out rooms since they are a great help in covering her expenses.

The loans have enabled her to grow because she can make improvements to her rental rooms. With her previous loan, she was able to make progress on the security wall around her large piece of property. Only a small portion is still covered in zinc sheets.

Eveling has purchased materials using the profits from her sales and the help of remittances from her children who continue to work in Costa Rica. However, she has postponed the continuation of the security wall so that she can build another room to rent. She will finish the wall later even though it is a high priority. Her goal is to have more income for when her entire family returns to Nicaragua so that she can cover the expenses.

loans.use: to build another rental room in her house.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es:
Actualmente María está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de tomates, repollo, cebolla, en frutas, fresas, uvas, manzanas, bananos, esta inversión le ayudara para incrementar la disponibilidad en el negocio, ofreciéndole a los clientes frutas y verduras frescas.
Lo que motivo a María es que el prestamo anterior le ayudo bastante, para comprar buenos productos, manteniendo un negocio estable, realizando buenas inversiones, para tener una mejor solvencia económica y poder cada día ir creciendo.
texts.en:
María is currently requesting a loan in order to buy tomatoes, cabbages, onions, strawberries, grapes, apples, and bananas. This investment will help increase the available inventory in her business so that she can offer her customers fresh fruits and vegetables.

María’s previous loan was quite helpful since it allowed her to buy good products and maintain a stable business. By making sound investments, she has good financial solvency and is able to keep growing each day.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, cabbages, onions, strawberries, grapes, apples, and bananas.

loans.name: Iris Beronica

texts.es:
Iris Beronica, tiene 38 años de edad, una aldea rural de Omoa, Cortes, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos de 8,14 y 18 años de edad.
Doña Iris es una persona muy trabajadora y conocida en la aldea, tiene 7 años de tener una pulpería(venta de productos de la canasta básica familiar, como granos basicos, carnes, embutidos, refrescos, churros, etc.), ademas elabora y vende pan, de donde genera otros ingresos. A su negocio le dedica tiempo completo desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:30 p.m.
Inició esta actividad con capital propio, luego hizo un prestamo con otra institucion para invertir en productos. Actualmente solicitó este préstamo a ODEF para incrementar sus productos en compra de granos básicos, embutidos, carnes, refrescos etc.Ya que esta pulpería es muy visitada por sus vecinos y han incrementado sus ventas.
Se sacrifica con este negocio para apoyar a sus hijos con la educación, porque no recibe ayuda de nadie mas.
texts.en:
Iris Beronica, age 38, lives in the rural village of Omoa, Cortes.  She is the single mother of three children; ages 8, 14, and 18.

Iris is a very hard-working and well-known person in the village.  She has had her grocery store (sells basic needs items like basic grains, meat, sausages, soft drinks, and churros, etc.).  She also makes and sells bread, and this generates other income.  She works in her business full time from 7:00 a.m. until 8:30 p.m.

She started her business activity with her own capital.  Then she got a loan from another institution in order to buy products.  She currently requested this loan from ODEF in order to increase her products by purchasing basic grains, sausages, meat, and soft drinks, etc.  Her grocery store is frequented often by her neighbors, and her sales have increased.

She makes sacrifices in this business in order to support her children’s education.  She does this because she does not receive help from anyone else.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sausages, meat, and soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Marcia Luisa

texts.es: Marcia Luisa tiene 33 años, ella es maestra de primaria está solicitando este crédito para realizarle mejoras a su vivienda como instalaciones de puertas, ventanas y reparaciones. Hace 4 años que Marcia quiere realizar estas mejoras pero no podía porque tenía que cumplir con las obligaciones diarias del hogar. Sueña con mejorar su casa con el paso del tiempo y realizarle las mejoras necesarias. El financiamiento es para la compra de puertas de madera, ventanas de vidrio, clavos, entre otros.
texts.en:
Marcia Luisia is 33 years old and works as an elementary school teacher. She is requsting this loan so that he can make improvements to her home by installing doors, windows, and making repairs. Marcia wanted to make these improvements four years ago, but was not able because she had to fulfill her daily household obligations. She dreams of renovating her house over time and making the necessary improvements.

This loan will be used to buy wooden doors, glass window panes, nails, and other materials.

loans.use: to buy wooden doors, glass window panes, nails, and other materials.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia tiene 30 años, es una mujer trabajadora y muy sociable. Vive en compañía de su pareja y de sus dos hijos en su propia casa, inmueble que logró comprar a base de mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza, es la venta de pescado, producto que lo adquiere de los puertes fluviales ya que son varios comerciante que traen este producto de la costa, asimismo lo compra en las piscigranjas donde crían pescados. Su centro de trabajo se encuentra en el mercado municipal de su distrito y desde hace seis meses es que se dedica a éste trabajo. Lo que le de esta actividad es el tener un ingreso económico, gracias a ello puede solventar los gastos de su hogar, asimismo ayudar en la educación de sus hijos. Esta feliz por que su negocio le ha resultado rentable, pues el pescado tiene mucha demanda en su población. Tiene planes de poder incursionar en la venta al mayoreo de éste producto para lo cual necesita mayor cantidad de capital de trabajo. Este seria el segundo crédito con MFP, se siente muy contenta de poder contar con el apoyo de la institución, manifiesta que seguirá siendo puntual en el pago de sus cuotas para poder tener acceso a más créditos futuros. Con el monto solicitado, lo invertirá en la compra de pescado al por mayor y así poder tener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Sonia, age 30, is a hardworking and sociable woman. She lives with her partner and their two children in their own home, which they were able to purchase through much effort. Sonia sells fish and acquires her products at the river ports where several merchants bring them from the coast. She also acquires some of her inventory from fish farms. Her primary workplace is at the municipal market in her district where she has been performing her job for the past six months. What she likes about this business is being able to generate an income. Thanks to her efforts, she has been able to cover the household expenses and provide an education for her children at the same time. Sonia is happy that her business has produced profitable results since fish is in great demand in her town. She has plans of become a wholesaler of this product, but she needs to acquire more operating capital.

This will be her second loan with MFP. Sonia is very pleased to have the support of the organization. She says that she is confident that she can submit her payments on time so that she will be eligible to access more loans in the future. The amount she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of fish in bulk so that she can generate better earnings.

loans.use: to buy fish in bulk.

loans.name: María Ismelda

texts.es:
La señora María tiene 39 años edad, es casada con cinco hijos.
Ella se dedica a la corta D. café desD. los seis años, ese ha sido el trabajo que ha realizado con su familia y ahora con su esposo, también tiene la actividad D. crianza D. cerdos. María es una persona muy trabajadora, sale D. su casa a las 4 D. la mañana a cortar café a unas haciendas situadas a una hora D. su casa y sale a cortar unas 50 libras D. café.
Como se dedica también a la crianza D. cerdos, estos los compra  el día del comercio D. un cantón, ella va a los tiangues (lugar donD. se comercializan animales) a adquirir los cerdos.
María solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar 500 tejas y cuartones D. madera, para el techo D. su casa, que es lo que le hace falta para terminar la construcción y para pagarle a una persona, que le ayuD. a su esposo, ya que él es albañil y se encarga del manejo del trabajo.
Con la inversión ellos tendrían el material para el techo D. su casa y no sufrirán con las lluvias que se moje su vivienda. Además vivirán mejor los siete miembros D. la familia, pues cozaran D. seguridad por cualquier eventualidad que se pueda presentar.
En el futuro, María desea continuar construyendo su casa, para que cada miembro D. la familia, tenga una habitación o los varones una habitación y las mujeres otro. Actualmente solo  tienen una habitación para todos ellos, a demás desean repellar las paredes D. la casa, para que se vea más bonita.
texts.en:
María, 39, is married and has five children.  She’s worked picking coffee beans for six years, a job she used to do with her family and now does with her husband.  She also raises pigs.  María is a very hardworking person.  She leaves home at 4am to pick coffee in some haciendas located an hour away from home; she picks about 50 pounds of coffee. Since she also raises pigs she buys them on her canton’s market day at the tianguis [places where livestock is bought and sold].

María is asking Fundación Campo for a loan to buy 500 roofing tiles and wooden beams for the roof on her house which is all that remains to be done to finish building it.  She also needs to pay a person to help her husband since he’s a bricklayer and he will take care of doing the work.

With this investment, they will have the materials for the roof of their house and they won’t suffer with the rain that can wet their house.  In addition, the seven family members will live better because they will be safe from any possible eventuality.

In the future, María wants to continue building her house so that each member of the family will have their own room or maybe the boys in one room and the girls in another.  They currently have just one bedroom for all of them.  She also wants to plaster the walls so that it will look prettier.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies and to pay labor costs to repair the roof.

loans.name: Pablo Marvin

texts.es: Pablo Marvin tiene su negocio que es un comedor, desde hace más de 11 años. Ofrece comidas como gallo pinto, arroz con bistec, pollo en salsa blanca, carne desmenuzada entre otros platillos. A pesar de que no fue fácil mantener el negocio con esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado salir adelante. el motivo del crédito es para la compra de arroz, frijoles, aceites, verduras, platos desechables, cubiertos, bolsas, tortillas, chile entre otras cosas necesarias para la elaboración de sus platillos.
texts.en:
Pablo Marvin has managed a diner for more than 11 years. He offers dishes such as beans and rice, steak with rice, chicken in white sauce, shredded beef, and other foods. Even though maintaining this business is not easy, Pablo manages to get ahead through effort and dedication.

This loan will be used to buy rice, beans, oil, vegetables, disposable plates, cutlery, bags, tortillas, chili peppers, and other necessary items for making his dishes.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oil, vegetables, disposable plates, cutlery, bags, tortillas, chili peppers, and other items.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 40 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora y su deseo es progresar. Vive en compañía de su pareja y de sus tres hijos en su casa que es propia, inmueble que logró comprar con mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza Rosa es la venta de ropa, mercadería que lo adquiere en la ciudad de Lima, pues tiene una amiga que vive en dicha ciudad y es ella quien le manda por encomienda las prendas que le solicitan sus clientes. Tiene un año realizando ésta activbidad, y gracias al apoyo de su pareja es que ha captado muchos clientes. Lo que le gusta de sus actividad es que le ha permitido contar un ingreso económico, con ello puede ayudar a su pareja en los gastos de su hogar y satisfacer las necesidades de sus hijos. Sin embargo debe saber a que cliente vender su productos, pues son variso lo que le han fallado en el pago. Su mayor anhelo es abrir una tienda de ropa, sabe que la manera que la unica manera de conseguirlo es base de mucha dedicación y sacrificio. Este sería el segundo crédito con la institución MFP, se siente cómoda con el grupo comunal, pues los considera como personas responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado, lo invertirá en la compra de más ropas en mayores cantidades.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 40, is a hardworking woman who desires to make progress. She lives with her partner and their three children in their own home, which they were able to purchase with much effort. Rosa sells clothing and acquires her merchandise in the city of Lima. She has a friend who lives in that city and ships to her the clothes that her customers order. Rosa has been in this business for one year. Thanks to her partner, she has been able to attract many customers. What she likes about this job is being able to generate an income so that she can help her partner with the household expenses and meet the needs of their children. However, she must be selective of the customers to whom she sells because she has had several who have failed to pay. Her greatest wish is to open a clothing store. She knows that the only way to accomplish this goal is to press forward with great dedication and sacrifice.

This will be her second loan with the MFP organization. Rosa feels comfortable with her Communal Bank group because she considers the members to be responsible and supportive individuals. The amount she requested will be invested in more clothing in larger quantities.

loans.use: to buy clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es: Sandra tiene 29 años, es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora. Vive en compañía de su pareja y de sus cuatro hijos, a los que quiere mucho y desea poder darles una buena calidad de vida. La actividad que realiza Sandra es el transporte de pasajeros, para lo cual cuenta con un auto, que le fue heredado por su madre. Desde entonces ella y su pareja, se encarga de administrar y manejar respectivamente el vehículo. Con el tiempo el vehículo sufrió una avería grave, por lo que en estos momentos se encuentra inmovilizado y guardado en cochera. Por ello solicita capital para hechar andar nuevamente su carro y generar las ganancias que diariamente percibe, pues es más de un año que este trabajo le ha generado los ingresos para su familia. Su anhelo es obtener otro vehículo y tener una flota de carros y formar su empresa de transporte. Este sería el primer crédito con la institución MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, lo invertirá en la reparación de su vehiculo, como la compra de repuestos de auto.
texts.en:
Sandra, age 29, is a hardworking and enterprising woman. She lives with her partner and their four children, who she loves dearly and wants to provide a better quality of life. Sandra provides passenger transportation services with an automobile that she inherited from her mother. She manages the vehicle while her partner is in charge of driving it. Over time the vehicle has sustained major damage. For this reason, it is inoperable and being stored in a garage. Sandra is requesting capital so that her vehicle can be put back into commission and begin generating a daily income. She has been supporting her family through this business for more than a year. Her wish is to obtain another vehicle and have a fleet of cars to start a transportation company.

This will be her first loan with the MFP organization. She hopes to receive support from everyone so that she can continue her work. The amount she requested will be invested in repairs to her vehicle and the purchase of spare parts.

loans.use: to pay for repairs to her vehicle and to purchase spare parts.

loans.name: Maria Consuelo

texts.es:
La señora Maria Consuelo es casada, tiene 53 años de edad, cursó los estudios de primaria, tiene 3 hijos 1 de los cuales esta estudiando, se dedica al comercio, a la venta de ropa para mujeres, inició este trabajo como vendedora para otro negocio y ahora con su negocio lleva 8 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo para ampliar su capital de negocio, para la compra de mas ropa específicamente para compra blusas con blonda así como los que se muestran en la fotografía, espera en el futuro contar con mas mercadería.
texts.en:
Sra. Maria Consuelo is 53 years old, married, and completed her elementary school education. She has three children, one of whom is studying. Maria Consuelo is a merchant who sells women’s clothing. She started out as a saleswoman at another business and now she has eight years of experience in this line of work.

Maria Consuelo is requesting a loan to increase her business capital so that she can buy more clothes, specifically blouses with silk lace designs such as the ones displayed in the photograph. She hopes in the future to have more merchandise.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her clothing store.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El comité “ Kuña Guapa” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní. Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes, como la cría de animal. todas formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Natalia, ella se dedica a la cría y posterior venta de animales. Ella se defina como una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora, la cual lucha por el sustento de su familia. Comenta que este trabajo es muy sacrificado, ya que siempre tiene que estar muy pendiente de sus animales, para que ellos no tengan enfermedades y otras cuestiones. Ella agradece a la fundación por la ayuda que esta le da siempre.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de animales pequeños y alimentos para estos, ya que le será de gran ayuda para seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The committee named “Kuña Guapa” was formed by several neighbors from the city of Santaní who have joined together. All of the committee members have developed independent business activities, such as raising animals. They have all formed a very close group and are capable of collaborating in activities that strengthen their camaraderie.

One of the members is Sra. Natalia. She raises animals for eventual resale. Natalia defines herself as a hardworking and enterprising woman who strives to sustain her family. She says that her job requires great sacrifice because she must always be attentive of her animals so that they do not have diseases or any other problems. Natalia is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the support that is always given to her.

She is requesting a loan to buy small animals and the appropriate feed. This will be a great help in continuing to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy small animals and the appropriate feed.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo, tiene la edad  de  55 años, esta casado y vive con con su esposa e hijo. El con el crédito va comprar ropa para luego venderla a su clientela. El cuenta con varios años de experiencia en lo que es comercio de ropa o venta de esta y el quiere invertir en el crédito para compra mas mercadería pues está llegando una temporada alta para la venta. El quiere darle a su clientela una mejor atención y tener más diversidad de productos para los gustos de las personas. Tiene como meta prioritaria generar los ingresos para mejorar su nivel económico y su bienestar familiar y también salir adelante con los pagos del crédito.   Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Gerardo, 55, is married and lives with his wife and son.  He will use the loan to buy clothes to then resell to his customers.  He has several years experience in clothing sales and he wants to invest the loan in purchasing more merchandise because a season of high sales is approaching.  He wants to provide the best service to his customers and have a wider variety of items available to cover all tastes.  His main priority is to generate income to improve his economic level and his family’s wellbeing as well as to make the installment payments on his loan.  This is the first loan he’s gotten from Fudecosur.  He’s had no previous loans with state banks and Fudecosur offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her pharmacy.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to finish building the bathroom and to buy a toilet.

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es: Hugo, tiene la edad  de  56 años, está casado y vive con  su esposa e hijo. El quiere comprar madera para seguir trabajando. El actualmente cuenta con una mueblería desde varios años atrás y actualmente necesita realizar la compra  de madera para la fabricación de muebles para su venta. E l quiere compra madera de excelente calidad para darle a su clientela mejor calidad de trabajos y acabados perfectos. El tiene como meta poder generar con los muebles fabricados de la madera comprada  mejores ingresos económicos para salir adelante con la mueblería y mejorar su bienestar familiar.   Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Hugo, 56, is married and lives with his wife and son.  He wants to buy lumber to continue working.  He’s had a furniture store for several years and he wants to buy lumber to manufacture furniture to sell.  

He wants to buy excellent quality lumber to give his customers the best quality of work with perfect detailing.  His goal is to generate better income with the furniture made from the purchased wood to get ahead with the furniture store and increase his family’s wellbeing.

This is his first Fudecosur loan.  He’s had no previous loans with state banks and Fudecosur offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy lumber.

loans.name: Erian

texts.es: Erian, tiene la edad  de  22 años, está casado y vive con  su esposa actualmente que es su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito va comprar maquinas y materiales para fabricación de pan. El actualmente posee una panadería de varios años atrás y actualmente debe comprar unas maquinas indispensables para la fabricación de panes y repostería para poder abastecer a su clientela que aumenta con los días. El necesita poder darles a sus clientes más surtido de panes para así satisfacer sus gustos y a su vez aumentar la clientela para la prosperidad del negocio. El tiene como meta prioritaria aumentar su clientela, darle el surtido de pan a su local y generar ganancias para su bienestar económico de vivencia diaria para así tener su futuro con un mejor bienestar.    Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Erian is 22 years old, married, and lives with his wife who is currently his main priority.  He will use his loan to buy machines and supplies for making bread.  He has owned a bakery for several years and currently needs to buy some machines that are essential to making bread and pastries.  This will enable him to supply his customers who increase in number every day.  Erian needs to be able to provide his customers with a bigger stock of breads so that he can satisfy their tastes and also increase his number of customers for the good of his business.  His main goal is to increase his number of customers, stock his premises with bread and make profits to improve his daily financial situation so that he can improve his future better well-being.

This is the first loan Erian has received from FUDECOSUR.  He hasn't received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR offered him this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy equipment and supplies for making bread

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Edin

texts.es: Edin, tiene la edad  de 37  años, está soltero y vive con  sus padres. El con el crédito pretende comprar terneros para su engorde. El cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación adecuada de estos animales. El quiere aumentar los animales a su poder y también quiere tenerlos lo más antes posibles para la venta al comercio de la localidad. El tiene como meta generar con estos animales las mayores ganancias para salir adelante con el crédito y a la vez ayudarle a su familia con las responsabilidades del hogar y a su vez tener mejores niveles económicos para un mejor bienestar familiar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Edin, 37, is single living with his parents.  He will use the loan to buy calves to fatten up.  He has a parcel of land that’s apt for the proper development of these animals.  He wants to increase his herd size and wants to have them as soon as possible to sell in his local markets.  His goal is to use the animals to generate higher profits to get ahead with the loan while helping his family with the household responsibilities while improving economic standards and family wellbeing.

This is his first Fudecosur loan.  He’s had no previous loans with state banks and Fudecosur gave him the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Jenny Del Carmen

texts.es: Jenny es estudiante de Contabilidad Pública, tiene un negocio propio de reciclaje, y con esos ingresos paga sus estudios. El crédito solicitado es para la compra de una computadora, que le permita poder practicar y hacer investigaciones a cerca de su carrera. Dentro de algunos años se ve administrando efizcamente los recursos con que cuenta su microempresa, su inspiración es su hijo, ya que como madre y padre para él desea darle lo mejor. Ha presentado muchos desafíos a lo largo de sus estudios y los ha podido superar gracias al empeño que tiene de coronar su carrera
texts.en: Jenny is studying Public Accounting.  She has a recycling business and uses income from it to pay for her schooling.  The loan is to buy a computer that will help her do research for her career.  She sees herself in a few years efficiently managing her micro firm’s resources.  Her inspiration is her son because being both his mother and father she wants to give him the best.  She has faced many challenges during her studies and has managed to overcome them thanks to the determination she has to complete her career.

loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Jose David

texts.es:
José, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y sus hijos, él tiene 10 años de estar dedicándose a la agricultura, inicio cuando era joven, ayudándole a su padre, pero en la actualidad es el único medio de ingreso para su familia.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de abono y herbicidas, estos materiales lo utilizara para aplicarlos al cultivo de maíz, con la esperanza que la cosecha sea buena y sana.
La aspiración de José es trabajar arduamente por sus hijos, con el compromiso de que no les falte ni alimentación, salud y educación.
texts.en:
José is a farmer living with his wife and children. He’s been a farmer for ten years having started while still young helping his father.  At present, it’s his only source of family income.

He’s asking for a loan to buy manure and herbicide.  He will use these supplies for his corn crop hoping harvest will be good and healthy.  José’s goal is to work hard for his children so that they will never lack food, health and education.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicide.

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es:
Blanca, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y venta de semilla de marañón, vive con sus padres y una hija, es madre soltera y su hija es dependiente, Blanca aprendió su oficio al lado de sus padres, la granja de cerdos la tiene en su vivienda y hasta el momento no han tenido dificultades.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de cerdos, esta compra le ayudara para aumentar la granja y poder generar a futuro más ingresos provenientes de las ventas.
La aspiración de Blanca es tener un negocio amplio, con más capacidad para atender la demanda y proveer para su hija todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Blanca raises pigs and sells cashew nuts.  She lives with her parents and her daughter.  She’s a single mother and her daughter is dependent on her.  Blanca learned her occupation alongside her parents.  Her pig farm is home-based and to date she’s faced no difficulties.

She’s asking for a loan to buy pigs.  This purchase will help her increase her farm to generate more income in the future from the sales.  Blanca’s goal is to have an ample business with more capacity to meet demand and provide her daughter with everything necessary.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Nancy Marina

texts.es: Nancy es estudiante de la carrera de química y farmacia, tiene un cyber que es atendido por ella misma. el crédito solicitado será usado para pagar los módulos para finalizar su carrera. Dentro de algunos años espera ser la profesional que un día soñó, dueña de su propio negocio. Le prometió a su padre la obtención del título universitario y está a muy poco de poder conseguirlo. Le ha costado muchoe esfuerzo el poder finalizar sus estudios, y espera poder conseguirlo con el préstamo.
texts.en: Nancy is a student in Chemistry and Pharmacy.  She has an Internet café that she runs herself.  The requested loan will be used to pay tuition for the final course modules to complete her career.  She expects in a few years to be the professional she used to dream of being.  She dreams with having a business of her own.  She promised her father that she’d earn a university degree and she’s very close to attaining it.  It has cost her much effort to be able to complete her studies and she hopes to do finally so with help from the loan.

loans.use: to pay her final tuition costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Jane

texts.es: Jane tiene 28 años, es una mujer alegre, dinámica y trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su pareja y su pequeño hijo, en una casa que es de su propiedad, se siente cómoda y a gusto por la familia que tiene. La actividad que realiza, es la venta de plátano, comercio que lo realiza en un pequeño puesto que tiene en el mercado municipal de su distrito. Es así que su actividad empieza desde muy temprano, para dirigirse al sector mayorista donde compra los plátanos en cantidad y a un menor precio. Tiene un año dedicándose a ésta actividad, y hasta el momento su pareja siempre lo ha apoyado en todo. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es el tener un ingreso económico, gracias a ello apoya en los gastos del hogar, por ello lo considera rentable este negocio. Su anhelo es ampliar su negocio y de esa manera podrá tener más ganancias. Este seria el segundo crédito con MFP, se siente contenta con el apoyo que viene recibiendo de parte de ustdes y por tal espera contar nuevamente con su aporte. Con el monto solicitado, lo invertirá en compra de plátanos en mayores cantidades.
texts.en:
Jane is 28 years old.  She’s a cheerful, dynamic and hardworking woman. She lives with her spouse and little boy in a house she owns.  She feels comfortable and at ease because of the family she has.  

Her activity is banana sales, a business she carries out in a small stand she has in the local municipal market.  Her activity starts very early when she heads out to the wholesale market to buy bananas in quantity and at a better price.  She’s been in business a year and to date her spouse has supported her in everything.  What she likes about her business is earning income thanks to which she’s able to cover household expenses and this is why she considers this business to be profitable.  Her wish is to expand the business to earn higher profits.

This will be her second MFP loan.  She feels happy with the support she’s been getting from you and hopes to count on it yet again.  She will use the amount requested to buy bananas in larger quantity.

loans.use: to buy bananas at wholesale.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis, vive con su esposa y tres hijos, solamente él trabaja y su oficio principal es la ganadería, también herrería y hace viajes, su iniciativa lo llevo a trabajar en lo propio, no tiene ayudantes y tampoco tiene un horario definido.
Por el momento solicita un préstamo para comprar dos vacas, este dinero del préstamo le ayudara para crecer, teniendo mayores beneficios con la producción de leche.
La aspiración de Luis es ofrecer los lácteos a más clientes, aumentando el número de ganado y la calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Luis lives with his wife and three children.  He is the only one that works and his main occupation is raising cattle.  He also does metal work and does hauling.  His initiative led him to work for himself; he has no helpers nor does he have a fixed work schedule.

For the moment, he’s asking for a loan to buy two cows.  The money from the loan will help him grow earning better benefits from the milk production.  Luis’ goal is to sell dairy products to more customers increasing his herd size and improving his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy two cows.

loans.name: Elsa Isabel

texts.es: Elsa, nuevamente presenta una solicitud de préstamo, ya que necesita surtir el comedor, pues comprara 40 libras de carne de res y de cerdo, además de tomates, papas, ejotes, cebollas, condimentos, aceite, y utensilios de cocina. El préstamo anterior nos cuenta que le sirvió y que ha logrado mejorar, lleva varios préstamos en la institución y hasta el momento ha sido un buen cliente.
texts.en: Elsa is once again making a loan request because she needs to stock her eatery.  She will buy 40 pounds of beef and pork in addition to tomatoes, potatoes, green beans, onions, condiments, oil and kitchen utensils.  She comments that the previous loan was useful to her and she managed to improve.  She’s had several loans with the institution and to date has been a good client.

loans.use: to buy 40 pounds of beef and pork.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos, necesita nuevamente un préstamo, este lo invertirá en la reparación del vehículo, pagando por los servicios de tapicería, amortiguación, mano de obra, este préstamo le será muy útil para darle mantenimiento al medio de transporte. Para Carlos los préstamos han sido un gran apoyo, hasta el momento no ha tenido dificultades ni familiares ni del empleo.
texts.en: Carlos needs a new loan which he will invest in the repair of his vehicle, paying for upholstery, shock absorbers, and labor.  This loan will be useful in giving him the means to maintain his vehicle.  For Carlos the loans have been a big help.  He has had no previous family or employment problems.

loans.use: to pay for the repair of the repair of his vehicle with shock absiorbers and new upholstery.

loans.name: Jose Ramon

texts.es:
José, se dedica a la venta de pan dulce y francés, él vive con su esposa y no tienen hijos, su oficio es la compra y venta de pan en colonias cercanas, distribuye de algunas panaderías todos los días de la semana, transportándose en una bicicleta.
Actualmente esta solicitando un préstamo para la reparación de la canasta donde transporta el pan, además lo que le quede utilizara para compra más pan en efectivo, esto le permitirá tener en mejores condiciones la bicicleta, con una mayor seguridad para transportar el pan.
Su aspiración es en un futuro comprar su propia casa, que su empleo sea el que le permita mejorar y estabilizar su vida.
texts.en:
José sells sweet bread and French bread. He lives with his wife. They have no children. He purchases and sells his bread in nearby neighborhoods and also distributes it to some bakeries. Every day of the week he uses a bicycle for transport.

Currently, he is applying for a loan in order to repair the basket in which he transports his bread on the bicycle. What is left over he will use for purchasing more bread for cash. The loan will allow him to have a bicycle in better condition for transporting bread securely.

His goal for the future is to purchase his own house. His job will allow him to improve and stabilize his life.

loans.use: to repair the bicycle which he uses to transport bread and to purchase bread.

loans.name: Reina

texts.es: Reina, está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo, debido a la necesidad de materiales para el negocio, como la compra de maíz, leña, además de pagar mano de obra para reparar la cocina, donde prepara las tortillas, estos préstamos le ayudan para mejorar tanto el negocio como la solvencia economica y condiciones de vida para su familia.
texts.en: Reina is requesting a new loan because she needs supplies for her business such as corn and firewood.  She will also use the loan to pay for labor costs to repair the kitchen where she makes her tortillas.  These loans are helping her to improve her business and also improve her family's financial situation and living standards.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood, and to repair the kitchen she uses for her work

loans.name: María De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
A la vivienda de la señora María De Los Ángeles le está haciendo falta la reparación del techo. 
Solicita un préstamo para comprar el material que es madera, clavos, lámina y papel granito especial para el techo, el actual que tiene está en malas condiciones y quiere repararlo antes de que llegue la temporada de lluvias y el invierno.
Doña María De Los Ángeles es viuda y se dedica a la venta de ropa usada y nueva, este es el ingreso que tiene para pagar el crédito, ya que sus hijos le ayudaran con los gastos familiares. 
Desea mejorar el patrimonio que le dejó su esposo y que esté en mejores condiciones para protegerse de enfermedades.
texts.en: Maria De Los Ángeles needs to make some repairs to the roof of her house.  She requests a loan to buy materials including: wood, nails, composite asbestos and cement corrugated laminate, and special granite paper for roofing.  The roof that she has now is in bad condition, and she wants to make the repairs before the winter, which is the rainy season.  Maria De Los Ángeles is a widow, and she has a business selling used and new clothing that is her source of income to repay this loan, since her children help her with the household expenses.  She wants to improve the property that her husband left her so that it will be in better condition and will protect them from illness.

loans.use: to repair her wooden roof

loans.name: Pastor

texts.es:
El señor pastor tiene 48 años de edad, es casado con dos hijos.
Él se dedica a realizar labores agrarias junto con su hijo, el cual esta realizando sus estudios de arquitectura a distancia en una universidad.  Don Pastor le esta apoyando mucho y su familia para, que se pueda preparar académicamente y no pasar tantos sufrimientos como Don Pastor cuando era joven, ya que desde los 8 años de edad se ha dedicado a trabajar junto con su papá. Ellos han trabajado con ganado y por eso a él le ha gustado trabajar.
Pastor, cría ganado horro (vacas que no dan leche), para venderlo a mejor precio y ganar mejor en cada negocio que realiza. Los animales los compran a los ganaderos de la zona ya que se los venden a buen precio. Los animales los alimenta con tuza que sobra de la milpa que cultiva cada año, está la procesa y la hace comida para el ganado.
Don pastor solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar  dos vacas de repasto,y la otra parte para recojer el pasto. para que aprovechen el pasto que esta en este momento, para que se engorden y venderlos a buen precio, para volver a comprar más. De esta forma obtendrá los ingresos necesarios, para brindarle a su familia alimentación, para pagar los estudios de sus hijos, y para tener los insumos que necesita para cuidar sus animales y darles de comer. Él desea bríndale a su familia mejores oportunidades, y realizar mejoras en sus cultivos para que sus hijos tengan el sustento diario y que sigan con la tradición.
texts.en:
Pastor is 48 years old, married and has two children.  He does farming work with his son who is also studying Architecture at a distance in a university.  Pastor and his family is helping him a lot so that he can prepare himself academically and not go through so many hard times as Pastor did when he was young since he started working at the age of 8 with his father.  They have worked with livestock and this is why he’s liked to work.

Pastor raises “horro” cattle (cows that do not produce milk) to sell at higher prices and earn more with each sale he closes.  The animals are bought by cattlemen in the area because he sells them at good prices.  He feeds the animals corn cobs that are left over from his annual corn harvest.  He processes them into cattle feed.

Pastor has asked Fundación Campo for a loan to buy two grazing cows and partly to use to gather the fodder to take advantage of the grass that’s available at the moment so that they will fatten up and they can be sold for a good price and then buy more.  This way he will obtain the necessary income to provide food for his family, to pay for his children’s schooling and to have the necessary supplies to care for and feed his animals.  He wants to provide his family with better opportunities and to make improvements in his crops so that his children will have daily sustenance and carry on with the tradition.

loans.use: to buy two grazing cows and partly to gather the fodder.

loans.name: Grupo Solidario Flor Blanca Group

texts.es: Freddy Antonio, Horlando y Claudia conforman el grupo solidario Flor Blanca. El Señor Freddy  tiene 3 años de tener el negocio de compra y venta de cerdos.   La mayoría de sus clientes saben muy bien que el siempre ofrece buenos calidad de carne. Cuenta con una clientela establecida y no tiene otra competencia cerca de su negocio. Esta solicitado un crédito para la compra de cerdos, y así satisfacer la necesidad de sus clientes en su consumo. Juntos quieren salir adelante y mejorar sus negocios.
texts.en: The group "Flor Blanca" is made up of Freddy Antonio, Horlando and Claudia.  Freddy has had a business buying and selling pigs for 3 years.  Most of his customers are well aware that he always offers good quality meat.  He has an established customer base, and there is no competition that is located close to his business.  He is requesting a loan to buy pigs, so that he can satisfy the needs of his customers.  The members of this communal bank want to get ahead together and improve their businesses.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Llerme

texts.es: Llerme tiene 43 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora. Esta separada de su pareja pero vive en compañía de su pequeño hijo en la casa de su padre. La actividad que realiza Llerme es la venta de abarrotes en general, para lo cual cuenta con una bodega instalada en casa de su padre, ahí atiende a sus vecinos, de una manera muy amable y cordial. Tiene dos años dedicándose a esta actividad, y en todo este tiempo su hijo mayor es quien más lo apoyado en el negocio. En un incio su negocio lo realizaba en diversos lugares, hasta que abrió su bodega. Para ella, este negocio es rentale, gracias a ello puede ayudar en la economía de su hogar. Este sería el crédito número dos con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida con la oportunidad que le dan. Con el monto solicitado, compará más productos al por mayor como: azúcar, leches, arroz , huevos.
texts.en:
Llerme is 43 years old.  She is a cheerful and hard-working woman who is separated from her partner and lives together with her young son in her father's house.  Llerme's business is selling groceries.  She has a store in her father's house and there she serves her neighbors in a very kind and friendly manner.  She has been in this business for two years and, during this time, her eldest son is the person who has supported her the most in her business.  She used to carry out her business in a number of different places before she opened her store.  For Llerme, this business is profitable and it enables her to help towards her household finances.

This will be Llerme's second loan from MFP.  She feels grateful for the opportunity that she is being given.  She will use the sum she has requested to buy more products wholesale such as sugar, milk, rice and eggs.

loans.use: to buy sugar, milk, rice and eggs

loans.name: Maria Leonarda

texts.es:
La señora Maria Leonarda esta agradecida por su cooperación en el anterior crédito el la pudo construir el cuarto. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para terminar los acabados del interior que son comprar la pintura especial para el interior, accesorios y aparatos para la cocina. 
Doña Maria Leonarda planea pagar el crédito con el sueldo que reciba de su trabajo como empleada de una panadería en el aria de producción, ya que su esposo el señor Pascual se encargara de los gastos familiares con el ingreso que tiene de su trabajo con constructor. 
Desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y que el patrimonio de sus dos hijos este en buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
Maria Leonarda is grateful for your cooperation with the previous loan that allowed her to build a new room in her house.

She is requesting a loan to put the finishing touches on the interior, specifically, to buy special interior paint, accessories, and kitchen appliances. 

Maria Leonarda plans to pay off this loan with the salary she receives from her work as an employee at a bakery, because her husband, Pascual, takes care of the household expenses with the income he earns in his construction job.  

She wants to improve her family's quality of life and improve the condition of the family's property, which her two children will someday inherit.

loans.use: to put finishing touches on the interior of her new room

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
La señora Alejandrina es casada, tiene 30 años D. edad, es D. profesión maestra D. educación, lleva ocho años D. experiencia en este trabajo, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo que también es maestro D. educación..
