DeciD. solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra D. terreno ya que espera tener este inmueble y mejorar su condición D. vida.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is married, thirty years old, and works as a school teacher. She has eight years of experience in this work, with her husband’s support who is a school teacher too.

She is asking for a loan to use to buy land and she hopes that by having this property to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy land

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
La señora Martha tiene ya más siete años dedicándose la elaboración y venta de alimentos. 
Solicita un préstamo para invertir en compra de material para la elaboración de los alimentos y realizar algunas mejorar al local del negocio. 
Con las ganancias que obtiene de las ventas planea pagar el crédito, ya que su esposo el señor Javier se encargara de los gastos familiares y escolares de sus dos hijos con el sueldo que recibe de su trabajo en una compañía de trasportes. 
Doña Martha desea mejorar los ingresos de su negocio con esta inversión que desea realizar y que además no descapitalizara el negocio.
texts.en:
Martha has already been working for more than seven years in the making and selling of food. She is asking for a loan to buy items to prepare food and to make some improvements to the business location.

With the profits that she makes from the sales she will make her payments as her husband Javier takes care of the family expenses and school fees of the two children with his pay that he receives from his work with a transportation company.

Martha wants to increase profits for her business with this loan and not to use all the cash-on-hand for the business.

loans.use: to buy items to prepare food and to make some improvements to the business location

loans.name: Sonia Maribel

texts.es:
Sonia, vive con su familia, administra una carniceria, este negocio nacio por iniciativa propia, con la ayuda de su familia a sabido salir adelante, hoy en dia cuenta con muchos clientes.
Sonia, necesita un préstamo para invertir en su negocio de venta de carne, por el momento el préstamo será utilizado en la reparación del vehículo en el cual transporta la carne para comercializarla, y si queda saldo comprara una baquilla; espera salir bien con este préstamo, cancelar oportunamente para tener las puertas abiertas y seguir contando con este servicio.
texts.en:
Sonia lives with her family and runs a butcher shop.  This business arose from her own initiative; with help from her family she’s managed to get ahead and today has many customers.

Sonia needs the loan to invest in her butcher shop.  At the moment, the loan will be used to repair the vehicle she uses to transport the meat for sale and if any money is left over she’ll buy a young heifer.  She hopes to have good results with this loan, to repay it on time and have the door open to be able to continue to count on having this service.

loans.use: to repair her meat transportation vehicle.

loans.name: Wilber

texts.es:
El señor Wilber y su esposa la señora Marisol son padres de familia y tiene dos hijos de pequeña edad, a quienes les quieren dar lo mejor. 
Solicitan un préstamo para empezar la construcción de un cuarto en la planta alta de la casa, ya que no cuentan con el dinero necesario para comprar el materia que es (cemento, varilla, block, arena y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejora). Ya que sus hijos están creciendo y están necesitando su propio espacio en la casa. 
Don Wilber y la señora Marisol desean la seguridad y mejorar el patrimonio que sea para sus hijos. 
Planea pagar el crédito con el sueldo que recibe de su trabajo en la ciudad como oficial de transito de carretera, y su esposo se encargara de los gastos familiares con el sueldo que recibe de su trabajo como empleada de limpieza de una casa particular.
texts.en:
Wilber and his wife, Marisol, are the parents of two young children that they want to provide the best for.  They are requesting a loan to start building a room on the second story of their house because they lack the necessary money to buy materials like cement, rebar, concrete blocks and sand and to pay labor costs to the person who will do the work.  Since their children are growing up they need their own space in the house.

Wilber and Marisol want security and to improve their assets which will be for their children.  He plans to repay the loan with the salary he earns as a highway traffic officer and his wife will take care of family expenses with the salary she earns as a domestic employee in a private home.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools to open his auto repair shop.

loans.name: María Florentina

texts.es:
La señora María tiene 49 años D. edad,  es casada con tres hijos, D. los cuales uno depenD. D. ella.
El esposo D. María se dedica a la crianza D. bueyes, para luego venderlos. Ella se dedica a la crianza D. cerdos, desD. hace 15 años, esta actividad la aprendió D. sus padres, quienes le enseñaron a ganarse el sustento diario.
Los cerdos los compra pequeñitos, en un tiangue y también a personas que viven cerca D. su comunidad. Luego los alimenta durante seis meses, para engordarlos y venderlos a buen precio. Ella los mantiene en un lugar exclusivo para los cerdos (chiquero) cerca D. su casa, para darles ahí la comida y vitaminas. María comenta que se siente muy feliz y disfruta su trabajo. A parte D. los cerdos también venD. gallinas, pavo, entre otros.
Ella es una persona feliz, que se dedica a su trabajo y lo disfruta. Es muy querida en lugar donD. vive. María solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, por que dice que es una institución que ayuda al campesino y el préstamo será  para comprar cuatro cerditos, esto le permitirá continuar con su actividad productiva, la cual le genera los ingresos para subsistir y para brindarle el estudio a su hija. Mas adelante desea mejorar la cuchera, que es el lugar donD. tiene los cerdos.
texts.en:
María is a 49-year-old married woman with three children, one of which is under her care. María's husband works breeding oxen to then sell them. She has worked breeding pigs for the past 15 years. She picked up the traD. from her parents, who taught her how to work for a living.

She buys piglets from a livestock market and also from people close to her community. Then, she feeds them for six months to fatten them up and sells them at a good price. She keeps them in a special place for pigs (chiquero) near her home, in order to feed them and give them vitamins. María says that she is very happy and enjoys her work. Apart from pigs, she also sells hens, turkeys and other animals.

She is very happy and committed to her work, enjoys it. She is very loved where she lives. María is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo, because she says that it is an institution that helps rural workers. With this loan, she will buy four piglets, which will allow her to continue on with her business, as well as pay for her daughter's education. In the future she wishes to improve the area where she keeps her pigs.

loans.use: to purchase four piglets.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es: Raquel tiene 27 años, es una mujer trabajadora y alegre. Vive en compañía de su pareja y sus cuatro hijos, en una casa de su propiedad, la cual logró adquirir con mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza Raquel, es la venta de yucas, limones y verduras regionales en un puesto de venta, ubicado en el mercado municipal de su distrito. Es así que debe levantarse muy temprano para comprar dichos productos a loa comerciantes mayoristas. Tiene más de un año dedicándose a esta actividad y hasta el momento lo ha hecho sola. Ella considera rentable éste negocio, gracias a ello puede solventar los gastos de su hogar, asú ayuda a su pareja. Su plantes es ampliar su negocio con mayor inversión, para tener más ganancias. Este sería el préstamo número dos con la institución MFP, por lo que espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes. Con el monto solicitado, lo invertirá en la compra de productos como: yucas, limones y verduras.
texts.en:
Raquel, 27, is a hardworking, cheerful woman.  She lives with her spouse and four children in a house that is her property and that she managed to acquire with much effort.  Raquel’s activity is the sale of manioc, lemons and regional vegetables in a stand located in a municipal market in her district. 

She must rise early therefore to buy her merchandise from wholesalers.  She’s been in business for over a year and to date has worked alone.  She considers this business to be profitable and thanks to it is able to cover her household expenses and help her spouse.  Her plan is to expand the business with more investment to earn higher profits.  

This will be MFP loan #2 and she hopes for support from all of you.  She will use the requested amount to buy such products as manioc, lemons and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy cassava, lemons and vegetables.

loans.name: Cruz Donald

texts.es: Cruz Donal se dedica a ser el sub director administrativo de un centro de enseñanzas. El solicita el crédito para la construcción de un sanitario, cemento, arena, con sumidero, el siempre se ha caracterizado por ser un hombre y padre responsable. Quiere realizar estas mejoras a su vivienda porque son necesarias para su familia, pues esta no es la primera experiencia que él tiene con créditos es por eso que se siente muy contento de obtener este financiamiento.
texts.en: Cruz Donald is a vice-principal at a school.  He requests the loan to buy supplies like cement, sand and drains to build a bathroom.  He’s always been characterized by being a responsible man and father.  He wants to do these home repairs because they are necessary for his family.  This isn’t his first experience with loans and he feels happy to be getting this financing.

loans.use: to buy cement and a toilet.

loans.name: Blanca Berta

texts.es:
Blanca, esta nuevamente solicitando préstamo, esto se debe a la necesidad D. fortalecer el negocio, por el momento comprara, materiales para la elaboración D. recuerdos para eventos sociales, como tazas, plásticos,  papel, tela, pega y demás cosas que son parte del proceso para este trabajo. Estos préstamos le han ayudado a Blanca para fortalecer el negocio, dándole una mayor seguridad en la atención al cliente.
Su condición familiar ha sido más favorable y espera continuar D. esta manera para crecer en el negocio.
texts.en:
Blanca is asking for another loan, due to the necessity of building up the business.

Right now she will buy materials needed to make keepsakes for social events, such as cups, plastics, paper, fabric, glue and other items used in the process of this work. 

These loans have helped Blanca strengthen the business, enabling her to give better care in the service to her customers. Her family status has been more favorable and she hopes to continue in this way to grow the business.

loans.use: to buy cups, plastics, paper, fabric, and glue

loans.name: Mariluz Del Socorro

texts.es:
Doña Mariluz continua con sus ventas en ropa y zapatos,  desde hace varios años, ha logrado la captacion de sus clientes, y trabaja independiente para poder ver a su mama tambien, que tiene mucho problena de salud.
Ella con esta nueva inversion, va a comprar mas variedad de ropa, de hombre y mujeres asi como zapatos y encargo que tiene pendiente para seguir ofertando sus productos y poder obtener sus ganancias, crecer en ventas, ya que tiene que cubrir todos sus gastos. Y apoyar a su mama con los gastos de medicina y que gracias a esta iniciativa del financiamiento le es mas posible su comercio.
texts.en:
Mariluz continues selling clothes and shoes; she’s been in business several years and has managed to secure a regular clientele.  She works independently to be able to care for her mother who has many health problems.

She will use this new investment to buy a wider variety of clothes for both men and women as well as shoes and some items she has pending orders for so that she can continue to offer her products obtaining good profits and to have her sales grow because she has to cover all her expenses and help her mother with the cost of medicine.  Thanks to this financing initiative her business is more possible.

loans.use: to buy women's and men's clothing.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio, vive con su esposa y tres hijos de 12, 9, 6, años de edad, él se dedica al comercio de ropa, hamacas, y el cultivo de maíz y frijol, él atiende estas actividades apoyado por su familia, tiene ya 20 años de realizarlas, trabaja todos los días de 6:00am a 4:00pm.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos para el cultivo de maíz y frijol, como abono y herbicidas, que le darán una mayor seguridad para el fortalecimiento y prevención de plagas.
Su aspiración es apoyar a su familia, principalmente a sus hijos, educarlos y que se formen académicamente, además de mejorar sus cultivos y crecer en la agricultura.
texts.en:
Julio lives with his wife and three children who are 12, 9 and 6 years old.  He sells clothes and hammocks and farms corn and beans.  He tends to these activities with help from his family.  He’s been doing them for twenty years already and works daily from 6am until 4pm.

At present, he’s asking for a loan to buy supplies like manure and herbicides for his bean and corn crops which will make them stronger and help prevent against pests.

His goal is to support his family, especially his children educating them so that they will be formed academically and also to improve his crops and grow in agriculture.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicide.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es: Liliana tiene 26 años, es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora. Vive en compañía de pareja y de su único hijo, a quien quiere mucho. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, que lograron comprar hace pocos años, con mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza, es la costura, actividad que aprendió de muy joven gracias a su madre. Paralelamente también se dedica en la venta de comida, negocio que lo hace por las tardes, para lo cual dispone de una mesa que instala en el frontis de su casa, ahí atiende a todos sus clientes. Tiene tres meses vendiendo comida y hasa el momento le va bien, ya que ha logrado captar regualar clientela. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es el poder tener un ingreso económico, de esa manera apoya a su pareja con los gastos de su hogar, además se siente productiva e independiente. Considera rentable, éste último negocio, pues le genera más ganancias, mientras que en tiempo libre le da lugar a la costura. Su plan es seguir con la venta de comida e intensificarse. Este sería el primer crédito con la institución MFP, se siente muy contenta con el grupo que conforma, pues todos son personas responsables y solidarias. Con el monto solicitado, lo invertirá en la compra de ingredientes para la preparación de comida, como: arroz, aceites, fideos, pollos; asimismo comprará telas e hijos.
texts.en:
Liliana, 26, is a hardworking, enterprising woman.  She lives with her spouse and only son who she lives very much.  They live together in their own house that they managed to buy a few years ago with much effort.

Her main activity is sewing, a skill she learned when still very young thanks to her mother.  At the same time she also sells food, a business she carries out in the evenings.  To do so, she has a table set up in her front yard where she tends to her customers.  She’s been selling food for three months and to date has been doing well since she’s managed to acquire a regular clientele.

What she likes about her activity is being able to have income to help her spouse with household expenses.  Besides, she feels productive and independent.  She considers the latter business to be profitable because it generates more income while she can do the sewing in her free time.  Her plan is to continue with the food sales and intensify them.

This will be her first loan with MFP.  She feels very happy with the group she belongs to because they are all responsible and mutually supportive people.  She will use the requested amount to buy ingredients to prepare her dishes: rice, oil, noodles, chickens.  She will also buy fabric and thread.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, noodles and chickens as well as fabric and thread.

loans.name: Juana Jesus

texts.es:
La señora Juana Jesus es casada, tiene 36 años de edad, cursó los estudios de educación primaria, tiene 5 hijos 3 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la artesanía al tejidos de telas típicas, inició este trabajo aprendiendo en otro negocio y hasta el momento lleva 10 años de experiencia.

Decide solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de hilos de diferente clases y colores, espera en el futuro tener un negocio mas amplio.
texts.en:
Juana Jesús is married and is 36 years old.  She went to elementary school.  She has five children three of which are studying.  She’s a craftswoman; she weaves traditional textiles.  She started the business having learned working in another business and to date has ten years’ experience.

She decides to ask for a loan to buy thread of different types and colors.  She hopes in future to have a bigger business.

loans.use: to buy thread for weaving.

loans.name: Marta Lidia

texts.es:
Marta, nuevamente está solicitando un préstamo, para invertirlo en la compra de quesillo, maíz, aceite, para la elaboración de las pupusas, ella se ha decidido por otro préstamo porque considera que necesita realizar periódicamente, nuevas inversiones para mantenerse.
Estas inversiones le han dado a Marta una mejor condición en el negocio, aumentando su capacidad para atender a los clientes, mejorando las ventas y con deseos de ser puntual en este nuevo periodo.
texts.en:
Marta is once again requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of cheese, corn and cooking oil to prepare 'pupusas' (a popular Salvadoran dish). She has decided to ask for another loan because she considers it necessary to make new investments periodically to maintain the business.

These investments have placed Marta's business in better condition, augmenting her capacity to attend to customers, improving sales and giving her the desire to work diligently in this new period.

loans.use: to buy cheese, corn, and cooking oil to make 'pupusas,' local stuffed tortillas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase paint, paint thinner, zinc, anticorrosives, filler, rollers, purlin (horizontal timbers to support a roof), and manual labor.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth tiene 36 años, es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora. Vive en compañía de su esposo y de sus tres hijos, a quienes quiere mucho. Juntos habitan en su casa ques es propia. La actividad que realiza es la venta de ropa, mercadería que compra en la ciudad de Pucallpa y en ocasiones viaja a la ciudad de Lima, donde logra comprar a un menor precio. Su modalidad de venta es a crédito y cada 15 días realiza la cobranza. Tiene más de dos años dedicándose a esta actividad, y hasta el momento su esposo es quien más la apoyado en el negocio. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es el poder contar con un ingreso económico, sentirse independiente y productiva, y apoyar a su esposo en los gastos que le genera su hogar, por tal motivo lo considera rentable, ya que las ganancias que obtiene son más del 50% de lo que invierte. Anhela tener su propio local para vender ropa. Este sería el segundo crédito con la institución MFP, comenta sentirse muy cómoda con el grupo comunal, pues todos son bueno compañeros y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado, lo invertirá en la compra de más ropas de diferentes calidades y diseños.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, a working woman and entrepreneur, is 36 years old. She lives with her husband and her three sons and she loves them very much. They live together in their own home. 

She sells clothing, buying her merchandise in the city of Pucallpa and occasionally she travels to the city of Lima where she can buy at a better price. She sells the clothing on credit and every 15 days she collects payment. She has more than two years experience doing this work and so far her husband has backed her in the business.

What she likes about this work is the power of having income, feeling independent and productive and helping her husband in the household expenses, and for the reason that her income is profitable because what she earns is more than 50% of what she puts into it. She hungers after her own place to sell clothing. 

This will be her second loan with MFP, and she says she feels very comfortable with the community group as they are good, supportive friends. With the loan she has asked for, she will buy more clothing of different styles and designs.

loans.use: to buy more clothing for resale

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es: Natividad tiene 51 años, es una mujer trabajadora, alegre y sociable. Esta separada de su esposo, pero vive en compañía de sus cuatro hijos en su casa que es propia. La actividad que realiza Natividad es la venta de plátanos, fruto que lo compra a los comerciantes mayorista de vienen de la ciudad de Pucallpa, en ocasiones ella misma realiza dicho viajes para traer sus productos y luego venderlos en un pequeño puesto que tiene, ubicado en el mercado municipal de su distrito. Tiene cuatro años dedicándose a esta actividad, y da gracias de que sus hijos la hayan apoyado siempre para continuar con el trabajo. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es poder sentirse productiva y contar con un ingreso económico para satisfacer las necesidades básicas de sus hijos. Ella considera rentable este negocio, pues el plátano es de consumo masivo en esta parte de la región. Este sería el crédito número dos con la institución MFP, se siente muy bien y cómoda con el grupo al cual pertenece, ya que son muy solidarios. Con el monto solicitado, lo invertirá en la compra de mayor cantidad de plátanos, esperando así contar con mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Natividad is 51 years old and a very hard-working, happy, and sociable  woman. She is separated from her husband and lives in the company of her 4 children in her own house.

Natividad sells plantains, a fruit which she buys from merchant wholesalers who come from the city of Pucallpa. Sometimes she herself makes the journey to bring her products home and then sells them at her small post, located in her district municipal market.

Natividad has done this for 4 years and she is grateful that her children have always helped her with her work. What she likes about this activity is being able to feel productive and count on sufficient income to satisfy her children's basic necessities. She finds the business profitable, since plantains are massively consumed in this part of the region.

This will be Natividad's 2nd loan through MFP, and she feels very good and comfortable with the group she belongs to, since they demonstrate much solidarity. With the money she requests, Natividad will buy a larger quantity of plantains, hoping thus to count on greater earnings.

loans.use: to buy more plantains to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ceramics such as flowerpots, flower vases, and little doves

loans.name: Juana Isabel

texts.es:
Juana, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad  D. crecer en el negocio, ella comprara vitaminas, medicinas naturales como: meganoni, jugostin, assai, entre otros que son productos naturales, ella ha logrado mantenerse por la inversiones que ha realizado con prestamos pasados, ya que le han permitido mejorar y abastecer el inventario para la venta.
La condición D. Juana está mejorando y espera seguir en el camino, hacia el crecimiento, para mejorar su calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Juana decided on a new loan because she needs her business to grow.  She buys vitamins and natural supplements like Meganoni, Jugostin and Assai, among others, which are natural products.  She’s managed to stay in business thanks to the previous loans that have allowed her to improve and stock inventory to sell.  Juana’s condition is improving and she hopes to stay on this road toward growth and improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more natural dietary supplements.

loans.name: Pedro Daniel

texts.es:
El Señor Pedro Daniel es casado, tiene 35 años de edad, cursó sus estudios de educación primaria, tiene 3 hijos 2 de los cuales estudian se dedica al tejido y amarrada de hilos y telas típicas, inició este trabajo siendo operaria y hasta el momento lleva 1 años de experiencia.


Decide solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferente colore y clases ya que espera mas adelante contar con trabajador3es para su negocio.
texts.en: Pedro Daniel is married.  He’s 35 years old and finished elementary school.  He has three children two of which are in school.  He works weaving and knotting threads and making traditional textiles.  He started this work as an employee and has a year’s experience to date.  He decides to request a loan that he’ll use to buy thread of different colors and types and hopes later on to hire employees for his business.

loans.use: to buy thread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Reyna Noemy

texts.es:
Reyna, vive con su esposo y una hija, ella se dedica a la sastrería, lleva 10 años en este oficio, este oficio lo aprendió asistiendo a una academia, trabaja todos los días de 7:00am a 6:00pm, tiene ya experiencia en la confección de vestidos. 
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales de costura, como zipper, hilos, telas, para la confección de vestidos, faldas, pantalones, esta inversión le ayudara para mantener en la sastrería los insumos necesarios, aumentando el potencial.
La aspiración de Reyna es velar por todo lo necesario en el hogar, apoyando a su hija en los estudios.
texts.en:
Reyna lives with her husband and a daughter; she’s a tailor and has been in this occupation for ten years.  She learned the skills attending courses at an academy and she works every day from 7am until 6pm; she has experience making dresses.

She’s asking for a loan to buy sewing supplies like zippers, thread and fabric to make dresses, skirts and pants.  This investment will help her keep her tailor shop stocked with necessary supplies thus increasing potential.  Reyna’s hope is to be able to supply everything her home needs and to help her daughter with her schooling.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Liceth

texts.es: Liceth tiene 37 años, es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora. Vive en compañía de su pareja y de sus dos menores hijos, en un casa que es de su propiedad, inmueble que compró con mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza, es la venta de bebidas como gaseosas y refrescos, que son ideales para el clima caluroso de la región donde vive. Dicho negocio lo realiza en su casa, para ello cuenta con una congeladora en donde mantiene sus productos a temperaturas frías. Tiene más de un año dedicándose a esta actividad, y da gracias de que sus hijos la apoyan al igual que su pareja. Lo que le gusta de su negocio, es el poder contar con un ingreso económico de esa manera ayuda a su pareja con los gastos del hogar. Su plan es ampliar su negocio y comprar otra congeladora. Este sería el crédito número dos con la institución MFP, se siente muy contenta y agradecida por el apoyo que viene recibiendo y por ello espera nuevamente con su ayuda. Con el monto solicitado, comprará  más bebidas como gaseosas en mayores cantidades, que le permitan tener mejores ganancias, e insumos como frutas y azúcar para la preparación de refrescos.
texts.en:
Liceth, 37, is a hardworking, enterprising woman.  She lives with her spouse and two minor children in a house she owns, an asset she bought with much effort.  The activity she’s in is selling beverages like soft-drinks and fruit drinks which are ideal for the hot weather in the region she lives in.  Her business is home-based and she has a freezer to keep her products at cold temperature.  She’s been in business over a year and is thankful that both her children and her spouse help her out.  What she likes about her business is that she can count on income to help her spouse with household expenses.  Her plan is to expand the business and buy another freezer.

This would be loan #2 with MFP.  She feels very happy and grateful for the support she’s been getting and hopes for your help once again.  She will use the amount requested to buy more beverages like soft-drinks in larger amounts so that profits will be higher and ingredients like fruit and sugar to make the juice beverages.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks and fruit.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
Doña Maria esta estable con sus ventas de tortilla y una pulperia que inicio hace poco, pues anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de fritanga, que inicio con dinero que su esposo dio  y que por motivo, que las ventas estaban bajas y  el pollo incremento de precios, no le estaba quedando ganancia, es por tal razon, el capital lo distribuyo en su nueva y pequeña pulperia.
Hoy en dia palmea por las mañanas docientas tortillas, y luego despacha en su venta, el cual quiere aumentar en productos, para crecer mas, ya que tiene poca mercaderia y obtener mas clientes, ya que su familia es de cuatro hijos, los cuales estudian y son muchos gastos, su esposo sigue laborando en seguridad, ambos queriendo un mejor futuro para sus hijos. Entre los productos a comprar: granos basicos, golosinas, caja de jabon de lavar, axe, productos lacteos, huevos, que es lo mas demandado por el cliente.
texts.en:
María is stable with her tortilla and grocery sales that she started recently since she used to work selling fried fast food.  She started with money her husband gave her because sales had dropped and the price of chicken had risen so she wasn’t making any profits.  Because of this, she used her capital for her new, small grocery store.

Today, she makes 200 tortillas in the morning and then tends to her store.  She wants to increase her stock merchandise to grow more because she has little merchandise and wants to obtain more customers because her family of four children who go to school generates many expenses.  Her husband is still working as a security guard and both of them want a better future for their children.  Among the products she will buy are basic grains, snacks, a box of laundry soap, Axe [detergent], dairy products and eggs, which are the items with highest customer demand.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 32 años, es una mujer emprendedora y muy trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su pareja y de sus tres hijos, aquines adora y son el motivo de querer progresar. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, inmueble que logró construir en conjunto con su pareja. La actividad que realiza, es la venta de abarrotes en general, para lo cual cuenta con una pequeña tienda, que acondicionó en su propia casa. Viendo las necesidades de sus vecinos y es que incursionó en este negocio, hoy ha logrado captar mayor clientela y eso le da ventaja en sus ganancias. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo, es que está en casa y cerca de sus hijos, además que genera ganancias para contribuir con los gastos del hogar. Su plan es comprar más productos y variedad para así tener más acogida entre sus vecinos. Este sería el primer crédito con la institución MFP, se siente contenta con la oportunidad que le dan. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más variedad de abarrotes como: conservas, leches en polvo, aceite, arroz.
texts.en:
María, 32, is an enterprising, very hardworking woman.  She lives with her spouse and three children who she adores and are the reason why she wants to progress.  They live together in their own house, an asset she was able to build with her spouse.  The activity she carries out is grocery selling.  She has a small, home-based grocery store to do so.  Seeing her neighbors’ need she decided to go into this business and today she’s managed to secure more customers and that’s an advantage for her profits.  What she likes about her work is that it’s at home and she can be near her children in addition to its earning profits to help with household expenses.  Her plan is to buy a wider selection of products to have a better response from her neighbors.  

This would be her first MFP loan and she feels happy with the opportunity she’s being given.  She will use the requested amount to buy more variety of groceries like canned goods, powdered milk, oil and rice.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tires and inner tubes.

loans.name: Dios Es Amor Y Mi Guia Group

texts.es: Indudablemente las damas son las mejores vendedoras. Porque además de que  son carismáticas, conversadoras y sensibles: jamás se rinden. Así se identifican las señoras del grupo Dios es amor y mi guía con tres años y medio trabajando, la señora Shirley de 63 años de edad, es divorciada y es un vivo ejemplo de una mujer luchadora e invencible, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, con trece años en el negocio, y ahora es una gran  líder de ventas de la empresa que trabaja, comenzó en este negocio a raíz que la economía en su hogar era baja y necesitaba mayores ingresos para los  3 hijos que tiene, que ahora son independiente, ella ha podido darles lo mejor en toda su niñez, con su esfuerzo le a dado estudios a los tres y a podido mejorar su casa, también se dedica a la venta de zapatos que trae desde Trujillo, con el ultimo préstamo piensa comprar calzado y   viajar al interior del país para vender zapatos
texts.en: Undoubtedly, women make the best salespeople because besides being charismatic, talkative, and sensible, they never give up. Here we have the women of the Dios Es Amor y Mi Guia (God Is Love and My Guide) which has been working for three and a half years. Shirley who is 63 years old, divorced, and a living example of a tenacious and invincible woman. She sells beauty products and has had this business for thirteen years. Today she is the top salesperson in the enterprise where she works. She began this business because the economic situation in her home wasn’t good, and she needed a better income for her three children who are grown. She has been able to give them the best childhood. With her hard work she has provided them with an education, and she has been able to improve the home. Also, she sells shoes that she brought from Trujillo. With this loan, she plans to buy shoes and travel within the country selling them.

loans.use: to buy shoes and travel to sell them.

loans.name: Roilith

texts.es:
Roilith tiene 37 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su pareja y de sus dos hijos a quienes quiere mucho. Juntos habitan en su casa propia que logró comprar gracias al apoyo de su pareja.
La actividad que realiza, es la venta de pescado y plátano, por lo tanto cuenta con un puesto de venta en el mercado municipal de su distrito. Es así que se levanta desde muy de temprano, tanto ella como su esposo se reparten las actividades, de esa manera se generan más ganancias. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que esta siempre al lado de su pareja, pues comparten muchas ilusiones, metas y anhelos, así como el ingreso económico que le genera y así solventar los gastos de su hogar. Su plan es ampliar su negocio y adquirir otro puesto de ventas en dicho mercado. Este seria el primer crédito con la institución MFP, y por ello espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes. Con el monto solicitado, lo invertirá en la compra de pescado y plátanos en mayores volúmenes.
texts.en:
Roilith is 37 years old and a joyful and hardworking woman. She lives with her life-partner and their two children who they love very much. Together they live in their own home which she was able to buy thanks to the support of her partner. 

Her business is selling fish and plantains, and she has a stall in her district’s municipal market. She gets up very early, and she and her husband share the work. This way they make more money. What she likes about her business is always being by her husband’s side. They share many dreams, goals, and desires. With the income she makes, she is able to afford the household costs. Her plan is to expand their business and buy another stall in the market. This will be her first loan with MFP, and she hopes for your support. With the amount requested, she will invest in the purchase of fish and plantains in large quantity.

loans.use: to buy fish and plantains.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy electronic appliances to improve her home.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Panales N 2 Group

texts.es: Luz Adilia, Martha, Yamileth, Maria, Marcela, Gloria, Alma, Maria del Carmen, Pedro y Maria Ofelia conforman el banco comunal Los Paneles. Luz Adilia se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y gallinas, desde hace más de 4 años que tiene este medio de vida, ella es una persona muy luchadora. Cuenta con una clientela establecida y no tiene otra competencia cerca de su negocio. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de cerdos y algunas gallinas. Lo demás socios quieren comprar los productos necesarios para sus negocio.
texts.en: Luz Adilia, Martha, Yamileth, Maria, Marcela, Gloria, Alma, Maria del Carmen, Pedro and Maria Ofelia make up the communal bank Los Paneles. Luz Adilia raises pigs and hens. For more than four years she’s had this way of life. She’s a very hardworking person. She has an established client base, and she doesn’t have any competition near her business. The purpose of this loan is to buy pigs and some hens. The other women want to buy necessary products for their businesses.

loans.use: to buy pigs and some hens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy hair irons, cream, perms, vitamins, hair treatments, a dryer, and a mirror for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Jogly Josia

texts.es:
Jogly tiene 23 años, esta acompañado con un hijo.
A la edad de 9 años, él empezó a tomar fotografías y a apoyar a su mamá en la toma de fotografías y video, entre otros.  Jogly tiene 14 años de dedicarse a este trabajo y cuenta que con el transcurso del tiempo ha aprendido mucho, y esa es su fuente de ingresos de la cual mantiene a su familia, al mismo tiempo que trabaja también continua con sus estudios.
Él solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para terminar de construir una habitación, baños lavables, ducha, una pila, el techo y pago de mano de obra. Estos materiales los comprara en una ferretería de una ciudad del oriente del país.
Con esta inversión Jogly, proporcionara a su familia una mejor condición de vida, podrá tener una habitación mas segura para su hijo de tres años de edad y su esposa. Él actualmente posee un baño de fosa, pero necesita un baño lavable, para mayor comodidad.
Él desea tener su propia fotoestudio, mejorar el equipo para realizar su trabajo, y tener mejor calidad de vida. Continuar trabajando con Fundación Campo y tener una cultura de ahorro.
texts.en:
Jogly is 23 years old. He has a partner and a son. When he was nine years old, he began taking pictures and helping his mother with photography and videography, among other things. Jogly has been doing this work for fourteen years and says that over time he has learned a lot. This is the source of income that he uses to support his family. Along with working, he is also continuing with his schooling. 

He is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to complete the construction of a room, including flush toilets, a shower, a sink, the roof, and labor costs. He will purchase these materials from a hardware store in a city in the eastern part of the country. This investment will allow Jogly to provide his family with a higher standard of living, and he will have a safer room for his three-year-old son and his wife. He currently has a pit toilet, but he needs a flush toilet for increased convenience. 

He would like to have his own photography studio, upgrade the equipment that he uses in his work, and have a better quality of life. He would also like to continue working with Fundación Campo and maintain a savings mindset.

loans.use: to complete the construction of a room, including flush toilets, a shower, a sink, the roof, and labor costs.

loans.name: Ocuituco Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama Ocuituco, está conformado por la señora Elena va a comprar con su crédito cremas, perfumes y cosméticos, la señora María va a comprar frijol, masa, maíz, leña, la señora Mónica va a comprar aceite, azúcar, huevo, crema, yogurt, veladoras, la señora Celia va a comprar cecina para surtir su negocio, la señora Ana Lilia va a comprar catálogos, de temporada y zapatos para surtir sus pedidos. La señora Mónica tiene 42 años de edad, ella es casada su esposo es comerciante ellos tiene 2 hijos 1 varón y 1 mujer los dos mayores de edad, ella tiene una tienda de abarrotes, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar veladoras, refrescos, aguas, platos y vasos desechables, sabritas, bimbo, queso, jamón, salchichas, huevo, jabón, café, leches, sopas, ella inicio su negocio hace 10 años, con un dinero que tenia ahorrado su esposo y fue aprendiendo a trabajar en la tienda, su negocio es importante porque de ahí tiene dinero para algún imprevisto de enfermedad para la medicina y para el doctor, a ella le gusta despachar atender bien a sus clientes platicar con las señoras, su negocio le ha ayudado a su familia para la comida, ella está muy contenta con este préstamo que va a recibir es una ayuda para invertir en su negocio, para crecer la tienda y los clientes encuentren lo que buscan. Sus sueños y esperanzas son ser abuelitos, estar bien de salud, salir a pasear y que sus hijos se superen, que sean felices y tengan sus propias cosas. Las integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “les agradecemos sus préstamos que nos hacen, es un apoyo muy grande que nos proporcionan porque si hay mucha necesidad y con su ayuda podemos salir adelante los negocios y las familias”.
texts.en:
This group is called “Ocuituco.” The members are Elena who will use the loan to buy creams, perfumes and cosmetics, María who will buy beans, tortilla dough, corn and firewood, Mónica who will buy oil, sugar, eggs, cream, yoghurt and votive candles, Celia who will buy dried meat to stock her store, Ana Lilia who will buy seasonal shoe catalogues to fill her orders.

Mónica is 42 years old, married to her husband who is a merchant and they have two adult children, a boy and a girl.  She has a grocery store and asked for the loan to buy votive candles, soft-drinks, water, disposable drinking glasses and plates, Sabritas brand snacks, Bimbo brand baked goods, cheese, ham, sausages, eggs, soap, coffee, milk and soup.  

She started the business ten years ago with some money her husband had saved up and she gradually learned how to manage the store.  Her business is important because she earns money from it to cover unexpected illnesses, for the money and for the doctor.  She likes tending well to her customers, to chat with the housewives.  Her business has helped her family to have food.  She is very happy with this loan she’s going to get because it’s a help to invest in her store, to make it grow and so that customers can find what they are looking for.

Her dreams and goals are to become grandparents, to be healthy, to go out traveling and that her children get ahead in life, are happy and that they have their own houses.

The group members want to say to Kiva and to Fundación Realidad: “We thank you for the loans you give us; it’s a big support you provide because the need is great and with your help we can get ahead with our businesses and with our families.”

loans.use: to buy votive candles, soft-drinks, water, disposable drinking glasses and plates, Sabritas brand snacks and Bimbo baked goods.

loans.name: 5 De Mayo Group

texts.es: Las nuevas integrantes del grupo son la señora Maria Manuela va a comprar con su prestamo pollo para engordar, la señora Virginia va a comprar alimento para engordar cerdos, las otras integrantes siguen en su actividad que vienen desarrollando. La señora Yecenia tiene 33 años de edad, ella es casada su esposo es albañil, ellos tiene 3 hijos varones, dos están estudiando la primaria y el otro todavía no va a la escuela, ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, pollos y becerros, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar cerdos lechones para criarlos y después venderlos, ella inicio su negocio hace 11 años, su mama criaba puercos de ahí ella aprendió, su mama le regalo la primer cerda criandera, su negocio es importante porque ayuda a su familia a vestirlos y a calzarlos, ella enfrenta los desafíos de costos elevados en el alimento de su animales el maíz subió el precio. Su negocio ha ayudado a su familia de ahí tienen para comer hay gallinas, huevos para preparar la comida. Sus sueños y esperanzas son construir su cocina y que sus niños tengan su recamara aparte, que tengamos recursos para mandar a sus hijos a la escuela y comprar sus útiles y uniformes. Los integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “muchas gracias y que nos sigan prestando para que sigamos avanzando, gracias a ustedes podemos salir adelante nos ayudan a vivir mejor con la familia.
texts.en:
The new group members are María Manuela who will use the loan to buy chicks to raise and Virginia who will buy pig feed.  The other members continue with the activities they’ve been carrying out.  

Yecenia, 33, is married; her husband’s a bricklayer.  They have three boys, two are in elementary school and the other one hasn’t started school yet.  She raises pigs, chickens and calves.  She asked for the loan to buy piglets to raise and then sell.  She started her business 11 years ago.  Her mother raised pigs and that’s where she learned.  Her mother gave her her first litter of pigs to raise.  Her business is important because it helps her feed, clothe and provide shoes for her family.  The challenges she faces are the rising costs of animal feed; corn prices rose.  Her business has helped her family because they get food from it, there are chickens to eat, eggs to make into meals.  Her dreams and hopes are to build a kitchen and that her children have separate bedrooms, that they have resources to send their children to school, to buy school supplies and uniforms.

The group members want to say to Kiva and to Fundación Realidad: “Many thanks and please keep lending to us so that we can continue advancing.  Thanks to you we are able to get ahead and you help us live better with our families.”

loans.use: to buy piglets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials for her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy oil, beans, eggs, snack, and detergents.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shoe soles, sheet metal for heels, thread, and glue.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, yeast, fat, wood, margarine.

loans.name: Olga Florinda

texts.es:
La señora Olga Florinda es casada, tiene 43 años D. edad, cursó el sexto año D. educación primaria, tiene 3 hijos 1 D. los cuales aun esta estudiando, se dedica al comercio a la venta D. ropa para mujeres, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien la apoya con los gastos que realiza.

solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para para los estudios D. su hijo ya que próximamente se estará graduando en la secundaria, espera mejorar su condición D. vida con la educación D. sus hijos.
texts.en:
Olga Florinda is married and 43 years old. She finished her 6th year of primary school. She has 3 children, one of which is studying. She works in a store selling women’s clothing. She has the support of her husband who helps her with the fees she incurs. 

She asks for a loan which she will use for her son’s studies since he will next be a secondary school graduate. She hopes to improve her living conditions with the education of her children.

loans.use: to pay for school costs.

loans.name: Frank

texts.es: Frank, de 26 años, es un joven emprendedor con ganas de realizar grandes cosas y mejorar su calidad de vida en base a mucho trabajo. Convive con su pareja, por el momento no tienen hijos pero habitan en casa de su padre. Su trabajo consiste en la venta de relojes, lentes, accesorio de celulares y otros artículos. Él tiene un stand en un centro comercial muy grande en la ciudad, y por tal es muy concurrido. Lleva ya realizando un año y medio en este trabajo el cual lo hace solo. Lo que le gusta de su negocio es la afluencia de gente que visita su puesto, y eso significa movimiento de dinero, por eso le va muy bien. Ahora que se aproxima la campaña navideña las ventas aumentarán. Por tal espera abastecerse de mercadería, y poder alquilar otro stand más y asi asegurar la entrada de más dinero. Este será el segundo crédito con la institución MFP, le esta yendo muy bien en éste negocio. La primera vez que invirtió gano bien y todo gracias que pudo acceder a un crédito con la institución, por lo que espera seguir trabajando juntos. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mercadería de la ciudad de Lima y así empezará armar la campaña navideña ya que le generará mayor ganancias.
texts.en:
Frank, 26, is a young entrepreneur with strong desires to accomplish great things and to improve his quality of life through his work.  He lives with his spouse and for the moment do not have children but they live in his parents’ house.  His work consists in selling watches, eyeglasses, mobile phone accessories and other items.  He has a stand in a very large shopping center in the city so it’s very crowded.  He’s been in this line of work for a year and a half and he works alone.  What he likes about his business is the large number of people that visits his stand because this means a good movement of money and he does well because of it.  Now that the Christmas season is approaching sales will increase.  Because of this he hopes to stock up on merchandise and to be able to rent another stand to insure a larger input of money.

This will be his second MFP loan; he is doing very well in this business.  The first time he invested he earned well and it was all thanks to being able to get a loan from the institution so he hopes to be able to continue to work together.  He will use the requested amount to buy merchandise in the city of Lima to start setting up for the Christmas season because profits will increase.

loans.use: to buy more watches, mobile phone accessories and eyeglasses.

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es: Haydee tiene 38 años, es una mujer muy fuerte, amable y sobre todo responsable. Es madre soltera de dos hijos de 12 y 3 años. Juntos habitan en casa de su madre, en compñía de ella y de dos hermanas. EL trabajo de Haydee consiste en la venta de abarrotes y productos de primera necesidad, teniendo como espacio de venta en la casa de su madre. Ahí ofrece los prodcutos que son de comsumo diario así como bebidas, tanto gaseosas y cervezas; del mismo modo tiene una copiadora, donde realiza tipeos de documentos e impresiones. Lleva por más de siete años, y gracias a la ayuda de su hermana y su madre puede salir adelante en su trabajo. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite tener un espacio libre para estar a lado de sus menores hijos, quienes necesitan mucho de su cuidado, además le esta yendo bien en el negocio y espera mantenerlo pues en el futuro desea montar una ferretería. Este será el segundo crédito con la institución MFP, la primera vez le fue muy bien y esto le dio a confianza para seguir trabajando con el grupo al que pertenece, espera poder seguir trabajando juntos ya que le es de mucha ayuda los préstamos que le otorgan en los desembolsos. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mercadería para su negocio, aparte desea comprar una congeladora para así mantener las bebidas frescas.
texts.en:
Haydee, 38, is a very strong, kind and, above all, responsible woman.  She’s a single mother of two children who are 12 and 3 years old.  They live together in her mother’s house with her and her two sisters.  Haydee’s work consists in grocery and staple items sales; she has her sales area set up in her mother’s house.  She stocks basic daily consumption items like beverages like soft-drinks and beer.  She also has a photocopier where she does document typing and photocopying.  She’s been working for over seven years and thanks to help from her sister and her mother she’s able to get ahead with her work.  

What she likes about it is that it leaves free time to be with her minor children who very much need her care.  She is doing well in the business and hopes to keep it that way because in the future she wants to open a hardware store.

This will be her second MFP loan.  The first time she did very well and this gave her the confidence to continue working with the group she belongs to.  She hopes to be able to continue working together because the loans obtained are very helpful.  She will use the requested amount to buy more merchandise for her store.  In addition, she’d like to buy a freezer to keep her beverages cool.

loans.use: to buy more staple items and a freezer.

loans.name: Petrona  Delfina

texts.es:
La señora Petrona  Delfina es casada, tiene 26 años de edad, cursó los seis años de educación primaria, tiene 1 hijo, se dedica a la talabarteria la elaboración de calzados y cinchos para pantalones, inició este trabajo con sus padres y hasta ahora lleva 4 años de experiencia.

Solicita un prestamos que lo utilizara para la compra d4e materiales consistente en pieles de diferente diseños y colores para la elaboración de calzados y cinchos y mejorar sus ganancias, espera en el futuro contar con operarios y mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Petrona Delfina, 26, is married and completed sixth grade.  She has a son.  She’s a leatherworker making shoes and belts for pants.  She started this work with her parents and to date has four years’ experience.

She is asking for a loan to buy materials consisting in leather of various designs and colors to make footwear and belts to improve profits.  She hopes in future to hire employees and improve the business.

loans.use: to buy leather and other supplies.

loans.name: Jason

texts.en:
Jason is 26 years old and married. He has one child, an infant. He lives in Punta, Panaon, in the province of Misamis Occidental. 

Jason owns and operates a motorcycle-transport business to make a living. He has been engaged in this business for four years, and it is his primary source of income. He earns about 5000 Philippine pesos (PHP) a month.

In 2011, Jason joined GDMPC. He has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase a second-hand motorcycle for transport. He is very determined and believes that this business could have an excellent return. In the future, he plans to save part of his income for his child's education and to invest in another line of business. For now he is thinking about what kind of business that should be.

loans.use: to purchase a second-hand motorcycle

loans.name: Francisco

texts.en:
Francisco is a married man with four children. He is 49 years old and resides in Tagulalo, Aurora, in the Philippine province of Zamboanga del Sur.

To earn a living Francisco operates a manufacturing business specialized in decoration-making business. He sells his product to the tourists and to the local community members and this product is for export. Behind Francisco is the product he sell. It is used for decoration. The items behind him is not yet a finish product. They have to color it or beautify before he bring to the market or before he sell it. That items is made of LAMPAKANAY that can be taken in the roadside of the fish pond. This is a roll of string. Francisco has been in this industry for 7 years. Each month, he earns 11,000 PHP doing this type of work.

Francisco has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase decoration-making items such as coloring materials (varnish). Francisco has been a member of GDMPC for four years. In the future, he wants to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more coloring materials

loans.name: Horacio

texts.es: Horacio tiene 53 años, es un hombre bueno, amable y muy responsable, esta separado de su pareja con quien tuvo tres hijos y ahora ya son mayores de edad. El trabajo de Horacio consiste en el alquiler de equipo de sonido a los grandes eventos que se realizan en la ciudad, negocio que comenzó hace 22 años, con un equipo muy pequeño el cual alquilaba en eventos pequeños. Con el tiempo fue creciendo, empezó comprando más parlantes y equipos más grandes y sofisticados, hasta el momento tiene la colección de equipos de sonido más grande de la ciudad y es proveedor de todos los eventos de la ciudad. En este negocio trabaja solo y contrata temporalmente a siete personas quienes son electricistas, sonidistas, chofer y otros más. Parelo a éste negocio tiene un vehiculo con el que hace transporte de carga y lleva ya dos años realizando este servicio. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que esta en el ámbito de la música, tiene buenos clientes ya que los eventos en la ciudad aumentaron. Mas adelante desea montar una empresa dedicada a la venta de materiales construcción. Este será el octavo crédito con la institución MFP, con quien lleva trabajando ya por cuatro años, esta muy contento con el grupo al que pertenece y desea seguir trabajando juntos. Manifiesta estar muy agradecido por los prestamos recibidos ya que le ayudaron a hacer crecer su negocio y le esta yendo mucho mejor. Con el monto solicitado, comprará materiales de construcción pues esta iniciando su pequeño negocio con la venta de ladrillos y ripio.
texts.en:
Horacio, 53, is a good, kind and very responsible man.  He’s separated from his spouse with whom he had three children who are all now adults.  Horacio’s work consists in leasing out sound equipment for big events that take place in the city, a business he started 22 years ago, with small equipment that he leased to small events.  In time it grew and he started to buy more speakers and larger, more sophisticated equipment until now that he has the city’s largest collection of sound equipment and he’s the provider for all the city’s events.  He works alone but hires seven part-time workers who are electricians, sound technicians, drivers, and others.  Alongside this business, he also has a truck that he uses for cargo hauling and he’s been doing this service for two years.

What he likes about his work is that he gets to be in the music environment; he has good customers because events in the city have increased.  Later on he’d like to open a construction materials and supplies business.

This will be his 8th loan with MFP who he’s been working with for four years.  He’s very happy with the group he belongs to and wants to continue to work together.  He states that he’s very grateful for the loans received because they helped him increase business and he’s doing much better.  He will use the requested amount to buy building materials because he’s starting his small business selling bricks and gravel.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy high heeled sandals, flat sandals, plain sandals, closed-toe shoes, closed-toed school shoes for women, crochet sandals, kid's sandals, transparent shoes and traditional leather sandals.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.en:
Nelson is married and has three children. Nelson is 52 years old and lives in Libertad, Aurora Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. 

Nelson's first loan helped him to repair his tricycle, which he uses to provides transport services to his community. The revenue generated is of high quality and he has proficiently paid back his loan. He is very thankful to GDMPC and the people who support GDMPC to help people like him.

Currently, Nelson is requesting a loan of Php 10,000 to purchase new wheels for his tricycle so that he can provide better service to the people in his community.

In the future, Nelson plans to use the income generated from his business to improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to repair his existing vehicle so that he can provide better service.

loans.name: Almaisa

texts.en:
Almaisa is married and has two kids. She is 24 years old and lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. Almaisa sells fish in their barangay to make a living and has had this business for more than five years. Each month, she spends Php 5,000 to purchase more fish to sell in the market. She has requested a loan of Php 7,000 to buy new equipment and tools for fishing and to buy more fish to sell. Almaisa has been a member of GDMPC for more than a year.

In the future, Almaisa plans to save for the education of her two kids and to sustain their daily needs every day. She is hoping that her business will grow.

loans.use: to buy new equipment and tools for fishing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy women's slacks, blouses, purses, sandals and children's outfits.

loans.name: Petrona Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Petrona tiene la edad de 61 años siendo soltera y  residiendo en el departamento de Masaya. Ella tiene 26 años de ser vendedora de loterías desplazándose por diferentes partes.  Las ventas ella las realiza de forma ambulante, la cual ella ya tiene sus clientes que cada mes le compran la lotería.

La señora Petrona quiere invertirle más, y aumentar sus ventas por ende sus ingresos. Por eso se acerca a las oficinas de Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de la lotería ya que ella considera que dichos créditos son de muchísima ayuda, tanto en su negocio como en el hogar.
texts.en:
Petrona is 61 years old, single, and a resident of the department of Masaya. She has been a lottery ticket seller for twenty-six years. She goes to a variety of locations to sell her tickets. She makes her sales as a street vendor, and she already has customers that buy her lottery tickets every month. 

Petrona would like to invest more, to increase her sales and therefore her income. With this in mind, she approached Ceprodel to request a loan for the purchase of lottery tickets. She considers these loans to be very helpful, both for her business and her home.

loans.use: to purchase one carton of scratch lottery tickets.

loans.name: Eelzi Jen

texts.en:
Eelzi Jen is a 30-year-old married woman. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She has two little kids now.

She owns and operates a general store for a living. Her "sari-sari store" is growing fast. Through this business Eelzi Jen is earning a good income. She earns a total of PHP 12,500 a month in managing her store.

Eelzi Jen's first and second loans from the cooperative assisted her in expanding her business. Her grocery store is very successful. The net income generated is excellent. It helps very much in meeting her family's basic daily needs, and she has been able to promptly repay the loans. She's very grateful that there is a cooperative like GDMPC. She extends her wholehearted thanks to the people who supported her.  

Recently she came to the GDMPC office and applied for a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy supplementary grocery products to sell in her general store.
 
Eelzi Jen wants to be able to support the study of her children till they finish their college degree, and to make her business more successful.

loans.use: to buy supplementary grocery products to sell.

loans.name: Juvy

texts.en:
Juvy is 32 years old, married with three children, and lives in Poblacion 3, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. 

Juvy owns and operates a business project in the agricultural sector raising domestic animals, like pigs. She sells her raised pigs to her buyer to earn a living. In consequence, Juvy attains a quality income. She earns 1,800 PHP every month doing this type of work.

Juvy has been in this business for 3 years. She requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase feed for her pigs for fast growth and better nourishment. Juvy has been a member of GDMPC for almost a year. Juvy's future plans are to be able to support the education of her children until they finish their college degrees and to make her business flourish.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her pigs for fast growth

loans.name: Carmela

texts.en:
Carmela lives in the village of San Roque, Panaon Misamis Occidental. She is 38 years old, married and has four adult-age children.

To make a living, Carmela owns and operates a business venture in the services sector providing motorcycle transport services. Carmela has been engaged in this business for 5 years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2011, Carmela joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Carmela  is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to repair an existing vehicle for better service. This loan will be the first loan taken out by Carmela from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: purchase spare parts for her motorcycle

loans.name: Marlon

texts.en:
Marlon is from the village of Rizal Jiminez Misamis Occidental. Marlon is 36 years old, married and has three adult-age children. His wife is a private employee.

To make a living, Marlon owns and operates a business venture in the services sector providing motorcycle transport in his community. Marlon has been engaged in his business for over 5 years and earns 11,000 PHP doing this type of activities.

In 2011, Marlon joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Marlon is requesting a loan of 35,000 PHP to purchase a motorcycle for transport.

He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the living conditions of his family. He hopes that his service business will flourish.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for transport

loans.name: Natividad

texts.en:
Natividad is 55 years old and lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 1 child. 

Natividad has a poultry business and earns approximately 20,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 40,000 PHP to purchase additional feed for the chickens. Natividad has been a member of PMPC for a year. 

In the future, Natividad hopes to expand the business.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed for the chickens

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is 40 years old and lives in Molatuhan, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 3 children. 

Marissa has a hog-raising business and earns approximately 5,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase feed for the hogs. 

Marissa has been a member of PMPC for 11 years. In the future, Marissa hopes to have big capital in her business in order to help their financial and daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase feed for hogs

loans.name: Jovita

texts.en:
Jovita is 59 years old and lives in Danao, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with eight children. 
Jovita works in the fishing industry and catches fish for a living. She has been doing this for nine years. She has requested a loan of 20,000 to purchase fishing materials and gasoline for a pumpboat to be used for fishing.
Jovita has been a member of PMPC for eight years. In the future, Jovita hopes to have savings for future use.

loans.use: to purchase fishing materials and gasoline for a pumpboat to be used for fishing

loans.name: Salceda

texts.en:
Salceda is 54 years old, married with ten children and lives in the Philippines.
Salceda is a farmer and grows corn to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. She has requested a loan to purchase farm supplies, like fertilizers and pesticide, and pay for the labor.
Salceda has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Salceda hopes to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and pesticide

loans.name: Ebadne

texts.en:
Ebadne is 47 years old and lives in Tacloban, Siquijor, Siquijor.  She is married with three children.
Ebadne has a Sari Sari Store to earn a living and has had this business for three years. Each month, she earns PHP 4,000 doing this type of work.  She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase more stock for her general store.
Ebadne has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for three years. Ebadne hopes to grow her business and improve her family's circumstances.

loans.use: To purchase more stock for a general store

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en:
Loreta is a widow with three children. She is 57 years old and lives in Baybay Triunfo, Ozamiz City.
Loreta sells snacks (siopao) to earn a living and has had this business for 20 years. She has requested a loan of 5000 to purchase five sacks of flour.
Loreta has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Loreta hopes to be successful in her chosen business.

loans.use: to purchase five sacks of flour

loans.name: Linel

texts.en:
Linel is 45 years old and lives in the small village of Sabang, Larena, Siquijor.  She is married with six children.
She sells natural medicines throughout the entire province of Siquijor. Each month, she earns an income of PHP 16,000 doing this type of work.  She has requested a loan of only PHP 25,000 to purchase natural medicines and continue to sell throughout the whole province of Siquijor.  
Linel has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for 11 months. In the future, Linel hopes to enable her two children, now in college, to finish studying.

loans.use: to purchase natural medicines and sell throughout the whole province of Siquijor
